title: EXCELLENT STAFF. IN THE HOTEL
text: Very friendly hotel. Helpful, professional, accommodating, kind staff. Courteous at all times. We felt right at home (I traveled with my 17 year old daughter). The hotel is a stone's throw from the subway but also a stone's throw from Times Square but away from the chaos. The restaurant is nice and the service very good. If I return to New York I will choose this hotel again

title: The Most Hospitable Hotel
text:
Innside NOMAD is the most hospitable property I have ever stayed.
I can name 19 reasons why:
Jose, Gia, Elizabeth, Hector, Kima, Leslie, Dirmarys, Denzil, Jonathan,
Hesnor, Patrice, Andrea, Modesto, Hector, Kiana, Nicolas, Paola, Daniella,
 & Alyssa. 

I am sure I missed some which stresses me because I love these people. 
Each staff member was kind, professional, personable, hospitable, engaged in intelligent conversation, and made us feel like we were at home. Each one went above and beyond to ensure our stay was exemplary.
From the Four Seasons to The Holiday Inn express and in between, this property is my favorite. 
 
Other important features of the property:
Large CLEAN rooms.
Great water pressure hot and cold!
Powerful toilet.
Comfortable beds.
Safe Safe Safe neighborhood-not too crowded nor noisy.
Room is quiet.
AC works well even on higher floors!  Heat rises, but the AC meets the challenge. Eco friendly as well.
Windows and natural light are excellent with blackout curtain if needed, but who wants to sleep in NYC during the day?? 
Window opens, but only with a small space for safety purposes. 
Endless amounts of boxed water & the coffee is delicious with the machine in the room. The machine can be tricky, but the staff will help 24/7.
Room rates at great price point. (Affordable!) 
The staff & housekeeping will come 24/7 to take care of any issue you may have. They are timely in their response and always come with a smile.
I cannot name one negative issue with this hotel.
Restaurant has delicious food and room service is fabulous.
Everyone is hardworking and each person I encountered had such a giving spirit. 
I have tried to cover items which are important to me as a traveler who wants to feel the comforts of home. 
There is nothing I should should warn you about.  My only warning is do not choose any other property! This is the best choice.

Rhonda "Cookie" Davis Stoner
Cookie

title: Style over substance
text:
Our visit to this hotel was abysmal and honestly made me want to cut our trip short. 

Pros:
Location. It was walkable to lots of places. The subway isn’t too far, coffee shops and restaurants. 
The water restock everyday was much appreciated. 

Cons:
We checked in and when we entered our room it hadn’t been cleaned. After a short wait, we were given the same room on a different floor. 

The rooms are small with no real storage for your clothes. A room which was for 4 people was lacking hangers, robes and slippers. Our chromecast wasn’t working, a phone that didn’t work and a squeaky bed. After speaking to the front desk, we were told that the tv couldn’t be fixed. We were given 30 minutes to be ‘upgraded’ to a ‘suite’. I shouldn’t have to pack a whole room in 30 minutes because the room was not fit for purpose. 

The suite had a living area. But was a sofa bed and a king bed. So not ideal for a family of four for a week stay. The room again didn’t have enough towels, hangers or storage. There wasn’t even bedding for the sofa bed. The room has several outlets that don’t work and we had two lamps malfunction as well as the coffee maker.

Room service is basic. Food is sent to you in to go boxes. Plates seem to be a thing of the past. If you are paying a premium for a service you expect to get the basics. 

I don’t think this hotel is worth the money. There are many other hotels in the area for this price which are better appointed. 

The hotel needs work in terms of quality control. I’ve never stayed in a hotel where so many things were broken. It was exhausting and put a huge dampener on what should have been a fun vacation.

title: Great weekend in NYC
text:
Denzel and Julio were so nice and helpful. 
They were amazing. 
We loved the hotel and can’t wait to go back. 
The design of the hotel is very modern. 
Rooms are so big and beds are comfortable. 
So many cute places to take pictures. 
The restaurant smells good and food liked yummy.

title: AVERAGE
text: I was not overly impressed with this hotel. We left feeling it was just average although we did like the location. It was central to a lot of the attractions. We booked the breakfast package but ate out on a few occasions , which speaks volumes. The rooms were clean but the views not great and we have ruled this place out for our next trip to this wonderful city.  Average ...

title: Great hotel, great location in NYC
text: This is an excellent hotel in a great location in the Chelsea area of Manhattan.  The rooms were modern and comfortable.  The breakfast was excellent.  The staff were courteous.  Have stayed in NYC 5 times now, and this was the best place I have stayed.

title: Wished was better overall…location good
text: Booked thru Costco. The process thru Costco very good. Hotel execution did not match Costco standards. Room way to small and dark. Esp the bathroom. Location great. Reviews are accurate. It’s challenging to keep things fresh. We expected more but settled for a bit tired in execution. For the money we expected more.

title: Fabulous
text: A very well located hotel, close to metro stations, comfortable, and with charming staff willing to solve the slightest problem or doubt that arises during the trip of any kind. They also speak Spanish, which is a very important point.

title: Centrally located hotel for exploring New York City
text: 27 West Corner / 6th Avenue. Perfect to start the day with TimeSquare / Empire State / The Summit / Rockefeller / Grand Central all within easy walking distance. Hotel & staff everything perfect and super nice. We loved it 😉.

title: Good hotel in midtown, but….
text: This is the second time I’ve stayed at Innside and enjoyed the atmosphere.  Huge problem this time- our room was on the 19th floor under the gym. At 6am on all three mornings we were woken up by a constant thumping that we learned was someone running on a treadmill.  You would think they could soundproof the rooms on that floor.

title: Vacation
text: Such a beautiful place, clean and convenient staff were amazing. The services were great stayed for 4 nights and they even provided water and juice on daily basis . I highly recommend. It’s so close to trains and Times Square is a walking distance

title: It was nice
text:
We were greeted very friendly and checked in. The team always made sure that you were doing well. Everything was fulfilled. There were only long queues for breakfast one morning.
The hotel is super centrally located, we could reach almost everything on foot.
The view is impressive despite the tall buildings.
In my opinion the music from the DJ was a bit too loud, but I was also there with my family. If I had been traveling with a friend, it would probably have been just right 🙈😊.
It's a really great hotel for a 4 day stay.

title: We couldn't have chosen better
text:
The Innside is an oasis in Manhattan, we liked everything, the warmth of the decoration of the rooms, the comfortable mattress, the refrigerator with welcome drinks that were also renewed, the cleanliness,...

Our daughter had an illness and the attention of the reception and room staff was immediate, making us feel comfortable.

We would return without hesitation.

title: Excellent customer service!
text: Whenever I travel to New York I am very careful when choosing where I am going to stay because there are many places that seem perfect, but they are not and this time I stayed at the New York by Meliá and my experience there was incredible although At the moment I was not completely convinced, I just waited to see what would happen and I definitely loved staying at the nomad thanks to the attention of Julio and Jesenia, they were very helpful to me!

title: A great base for exploring!
text: This is a hotel out of the hustle bustle of Times Square but in a central location great for exploring, with lots of food choices around, it’s a great base to come back to in the evenings. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, and the hotel had a relaxed, cool vibe. Our room was quiet and equipped with everything we needed. The staff here were all friendly and welcoming, accommodating requests with ease. I would come back! Thank you all, especially Denzel!! Thank youuuu

title: The hotel with comfortable rooms
text:
The welcome has been very good. The cleanliness and comfort of the rooms are perfect.

Regarding the location, the hotel is very well located. Even though it is in the center, the rooms are very quiet.

title: Great hotel great location
text: Loved this hotel and the location. Staff was amazing, Rob at the front desk went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. The hotel restaurant was great, rooms were clean and comfortable. Very European vibe. The location was perfect for being out of the hectic Times Square area but still convenient to get everywhere we wanted to go. Will definitely stay here again.

title: Truly Exceptional
text: The impeccable customer service started with Denzel and Jasmine at the front desk who expedited our check in effortlessly.  To start a hotel stay with such efficiency as well as genuinely caring about us as guests really made us comfortable.  We will stay again 100% guaranteed.

title: NYC family trip
text:
Thanks to mrs. Cristina, our stay was magnificent, she is very decisive, polite and willing to help at all times!!!
Thanks for everything Cristina!
Very clean hotel, well located with good facilities, very friendly staff, the restaurant is very good value for money with staff of 10!!

title: Excellent experience
text: We stayed 22 days in this HOTEL for the second time. The management and restaurant staff made us feel at home. Special thanks to Julio Geovanna and Robert who supported us day by day for all our needs in the Hotel.

title: Well located, clean, friendly staff but small and soft beds
text: Good in general, but small room and the beds are small to sleep two adults, as well as soft for my taste. Otherwise good, correct breakfast, very friendly and efficient staff, clean hotel; the location is good.

title: Family Gateway
text:
Love the location! The staff were very friendly and the atmosphere was amazing! They offered free water and juice during your stay which is a plus when you are traveling with children. 
Will definitely come back!

title: Great experience!!! Would stay again!!!
text: Absolutely fabulous hotel experience. Adorable boutique hotel with incredible customer service! From Denzel to Kimberley,Marcellus, Gia, Tiffany , Julius and more! Free water and juice in the fridge in your room. If you want more they are happy to give it to you free of charge. The restaurant was delicious. Good stay for a great price. I would stay again and again. Thank you.

title: Great place to stay!!
text: Great location, clean hotel and staff was very friendly especially Julio and Robert at the front desk. They helped me a lot with my room check in. Really good experience in this hotel. I will definitely come back!

title: Excellent hotel staff
text: Amazing time in New York with family and friends.. Staff at the INNSiDE New York Nomad was just excellent. Especially Robert and Julio at the front desk who made our staying more comfortable and enjoyable. Definitely we’ll be staying here on our next visit to nyc!

title: Excellent Stayed
text: I stayed at the hotel just for a couple days and the experiencie was amazing, the staff was very friendly since the first day until the end. Denzel, Julio and robert they made my stayed with them amazing, will recomend this place to all my friends and family!

title: Lovely Hotel
text: Really liked this hotel, lovely friendly staff.  Great location.  Didn’t use restaurant so can’t comment on that.  Spacious room, bright and clean.  Couldn’t say a bad thing about our stay here in New York

title: Quick and attentive service
text:
Hotel well located, clean, with soft beds.
I was very well attended to by Jason, he was very attentive, very receptive and polite, always available for any needs. It was the second time I stayed at this hotel and I had a great experience both times I was there. I recommend it and would come back more often.

title: Excellent front desk agent Denzel
text:
Excellent attention from Denzel. I wrote the hotel as I was requesting an early check in traveling from Sydney. Denzel kindly answered my email and said he will try to accommodate.
When I arrived to the hotel, he was really helpful and pleasant. Excellent professional

title: Such a great place!!
text: This hotel was amazing overall. The staff was friendly, welcoming and helpful. This hotel was so clean and spacious. And they location was perfect. We will definitely be coming back. One of the best hotels I’ve stayed in nyc

title: Excellent hotel , food , staff and location
text:
We stayed 3 nights in-this hotel and wished we could have stayed longer.. our room was clean lovely and big with a large comfortable bed all drinks in the fridge  and  coffee machine was all included and restocked each day .. this hotel is in an ideal position , everything in walking distance with the exception of 9/11 and Brooklyn bridge .
All the staff are friendly and welcoming, we did have breakfast and our evening meals in this hotel too and they were of a high standard. 
I would like to say a big thank you to denzel  who works in the reception area , as we did have an emergency situation and he was on hand to help out , he was very professional and gave me lots of information, he is a gentleman with a kind heart and is an asset to the hotel , we very much highly recommend this hotel for its location and excellent staff .

title: Very good hotel
text: Very nice hotel, the views of the city are magnificent. Spacious and well-maintained room. Very pleasant staff. Close to services and transport. Very nice neighborhood, close to the Empire State Building, Madison Square Garden, Chelsea Market...

title: Know the costs.
text:
Deceptive pricing. Watch out for fine print about resort fee.    Room was really dark needed to keep bathroom lights on to see in room 

Great location near subway station.   Younger vibe.   Was very clean. 
Would not return unless more honest about pricing.

title: A magnificent experience!
text:
Excellent!
Unbeatable experience! From the moment we arrived, the reception staff treated us with extraordinary kindness and professionalism. Special mention also for the restaurant staff. All facilities. Pending at every moment of the client. I don't give names because I don't want to leave anyone unmentioned.
The hotel, in general, very good. Very, very well cared for facilities down to the last detail and an unbeatable location.
Congratulations! Keep in that way. Many thanks for everything!

title: Thank you Innside Nomad!
text: Thanks to the hotel staff for making our stay very pleasant, the hospitality was great, in a cold NY we found the warmth in the hotel making us feel at home. Special mention to Isaac Gex Manager, always attentive, friendly and close, as well as Paola with her entire front office team. We don't know the name of the house keeping our room since we were always out visiting the city but it was still an A+. Thank you again!!!

title: Good and not so good points
text:
Clean rooms and good location.
Room wasn't ready for check in.
Do not have milk to make tea with.
Coming to clean room at 5pm when coming back to freshen up before going out again isn't something I've seen before.

title: 최고의 경험이었습니다
text:
앞으로 주변에서 뉴욕을 여행한다고 하면 이 호텔을 추천할거에요
핫플과 적당히 떨어져있으면서도 전부 가까워서 밤에 소음은 없고 어디에 가긴 편한 그런 위치였습니다
호텔에 일찍 도착했는데 흔쾌히 얼리체크인 해주셨어요 추가요금도 내지 않았습니다
호텔 냉장고에 무려 물과 음료수가 있고 캡슐커피까지! 게다가 전부 무료입니다
전부다 완벽하고 너무 행복하고 좋은 경험이었는데 딱 하나 불편했던거.. 욕조 물이 너무 안내려가요 ㅠㅠ

title: Best warm welcome!
text: We are just returning from staying in this lovely hotel! The hotel is in a great location close to everything. We were greeted by Gia who was exceptional. Gia gave us the best warm welcome, lots of helpful tips, recommendations of where to eat and friendly helpful service! If that wasn't enough she was kind enough to upgrade our room from a triple room to a beautiful interconnecting room with 3 beds so we can have lots more space which has made us so much more relaxed ☺️ Gia is a credit to the hotel and we cannot thank her enough for making us so welcomed 🥰 Do not hesitate to book here!! Amazing service, location and staff :) Big thank you to all!! Xxxx

title: Nothing to write home about
text:
My daughter and I went for our first vacation in NYC and were not blown away whatsoever by this hotel. I found one young lady at the front desk to be very rude and dismissive. However one young man made up for it and he was kind and smiled (unlike her). Room did not have charging ports for cell phones at bedside. Room did not have a clock at all. Room did not have microwave. Coffee machine was in a very awkward place. Room did not have enough lighting.  Bathroom lighting in ceiling overhead instead of above mirror, so gave strange lighting to try to do hair or makeup. Staff did not tell us ANY information about the hotel or city AT ALL. The television was not easy to use. The duvets were down filled and much too warm. I did not sleep the whole trip because I was unbearably hot. We opened our room window to get a cool breeze but were met with constant noise; sirens and honking horns 24/7.
Neither of us were impressed. Nothing special about this hotel or part of the city. Lacklustre. The only nice thing was the young man at the front desk. In saying that - it was literally a smile and here are your keys. That’s it. No other information.
We won’t be returning to this hotel.

title: Estancia en NY
text:
Buen hotel, muy bien ubicado cerca de paradas de metro y de Time Square, se podía ir andando pero sin las molestias del ruido. calle muy tranquila para descansar.
Temperatura adecuada en la habitación.

title: Vistas impresionantes
text: Hotel bien localizado, cerca de zonas turísticas pero no en el "mogollón". Aunque no son habituaciones grandes, tienen unas vistas impresionantes del sur de Manhattan. Agua y café/te de cortesía en la habitación. El gimnasio, bien dotado y con las mismas vistas maravillosas.

title: Among the very best boutique hotels in NYC
text: Just blocks from Penn Station, Macy’s and Flatiron, this place does everything right: modern art, sparkling rooms, great views, great in-house eats at The Wilson. Staff are incredibly pro and the design vibe crosses NYC Art World with Euro cool (the parent company, Meliá, is based in Spain). Rack rates are surprisingly reasonable and you’re close enough to walk to many sights. I even headed to Chelsea Market / Meatpacking and back (about 20+ mins.) But you don’t even need to go outside the hotel to enjoy this place. It’s that good. Shoutouts to Jason & the 100% service-oriented front desk staff (which is never a given in NYC, but here it is) and the GM, who is running a super-smooth ship.

title: Ladies Night Out Just Because…..
text: This is my second trip here. Love, love this place. The staff is amazing!! Shout out to Robert and Denzel who made our stay so awesome!!! Brought two friends who will definitely be coming back to stay. Accommodations were so nice. Great night sleep and all the touches. Coffee, steamer etc.

title: This hotels still owes my $200 10 days after check out
text: I booked two rooms via British Airways Holidays. On check in 2 x $100 was debited from my debit card (together with the nightly resort fees). I checked out 10 days ago and have emailed them twice, but I have still had no reply and refund of my deposits. So I am still owed $200. They ignore emails completely. I am really irritated that this is taking up my time, and soon to be money as I will have to call them from the Uk to discuss this no doubt.

title: Warning sneaky, high fees added at check in
text: The hotel charged me an extra '"resort fee" that added 50% to the cost of my stay. I was told it was for the tea, coffee and water in my room and to use the facilities in the hotel. Personally I think they should have told me the true cost of my stay before I booked. I feel strongly that to make such a large charge at check in is very close to fraudulent. I'm going to be a regular business traveller and I am never staying in a Melia hotel again, ever

title: Unforgettable Stay at this New York City Gem
text: Our unforgettable stay at this New York gem during Fashion Week was a seamless blend of safety, convenience, and style. We were welcomed and taken care of by Denzel Hamilton. The hotel's commitment to cleanliness and prompt service created a comforting environment for my design students. The Wilson surpassed expectations with its delectable food, adding a flavorful touch to our delightful experience. A truly exceptional stay that checked all the boxes thanks to the amazing staff and professionals ( Akhlima Vllah, Kristina Calzeron and Denzel Hamilton)

title: Amazing hotel with amenities & space for NYC standards!
text: I come to NYC a lot and this was such an amazing hotel in terms of amenities and the amount of space you get in a hotel room. The king bed was very comfortable and clean. The bathroom had all natural peppermint & eucalyptus products which were refreshing with a double shower head. To have a minibar complimentary is a rarity. Of course it was unique in the sense it was waters and GUS sodas, but they were unlimited and always available. The room includes a nespresso machine which is a must for me every morning! Room service just about anywhere would typically have 20% or high surcharge, and here you simply pay whatever the menu price is and it’s brought right up to your room when it’s ready in a bag. Nothing fancy or elegant but fabulous to have standard menu pricing! The views of Freedom Tower with the Empire State Building reflecting off a building were stunning to watch sunsets, snowy skies and to wake up to each. Location wise it’s accessible to Penn Station walking distance, herald square shops, Times Square is a longer walk but doable, and it’s about a 20ish min walk down to the Chelsea Market area. The 1 train is right at the corner of hotel block which is convenient. At night I don’t recommend walking alone though as the area changes from daytime to night. Overall it was a wonderful stay!

title: High Vibrations!
text: Hotel is cute and good vibe, dog friendly (I love dogs), rooms are clean, location is great, hotel staff is friendly and helpful and welcoming ~ thanks especially Jason Jasenia with our bags and ease of getting in and out! We had a great time, thank you!

title: Girls Trip
text: Great hotel in perfect location, rooms lovely we were on 19th floor. Only ate in hotel for breakfast 1st morning was good choice. Staff helpful. Very close to MSG and Penn Station which was great as we took the train from JFK airport so only 5 min walk to hotel.

title: First time in New York
text:
Amazing hotel in a great location.
We stayed in a double room with our two teenage sons. The room was plenty big enough.
From check-in to check out , every member of staff we encountered was friendly and knowledgeable about the local area.
Cocktails in The Wilson were delicious. We only ate here once,  but the food was fresh and flavourful.
Would highly recommend this hotel, a perfect base to explore New York City.

title: Excellent staff and service
text:
We had a great experience at Innside by Melia in January 2024.  The staff, particularly Jasenisa, Paola and Kima were wonderful.  Very pleasant, personable and happy to assist. They treated everyone with respect and courtesy.
We will definitely book again.

title: Close to everything
text: My family and I were very pleased with the service, the ambience, the coziness, and courteous friendly staff. The set up of the two lobbies, one outside witch is very well protected from the elements and the inside lobby. The convenience of a nice restaurant and bar. Very close to everything!

title: Experiencia maravillosa!
text:
la ubicacion es inmejorable, el servicio muy amable y el tamaño de las habitaciones grandes y comodas. camas comodas y baño grande, servicio de limpieza de habitacion muy bien, todos los dias.
nos ayudaron a conseguir transporte para ir al aeropuerto y muy coordiales en todo, cuenta con un bar restaurante y gimnasio y salones de conferencias muy amplios y modernos

title: Mein Favorit in NY
text: Schönes Hotel, mit schönen Zimmern und freundlichem Personal. Die Lage überzeugt, weil es nicht zu nahe vom Times Square ist, wo es immer sehr hektisch ist.  Trotzdem ist es noch sehr zentral und hat vieles, was zur Fuss oder mit einer Subway Station erreichbar ist.

title: Not great
text:
We booked a city view room and the view was a office block right Infront of the hotel - no skyline, our window was low so no view.

No robes or slippers on arrival - had to ask

Bath towels very small and tatty

Duvet cover to big for duvet and it kept falling out of the cover so would wake up with half of it out of the cover.

Late checkout could do not book late checkout until 2 hours before checkout so was pointless and receptionist failed to tell us this the day before so I got up early to sort it but obviously couldn't, also had to go down to reception in person as the phone to reception was always engaged (always!!)

Asked reception to book a taxi to the airport for 2.30pm and for 2 people with 4 cases. First of all she booked the wrong time and then we realised that she had also booked wrong size car and wrong airport - luckily we noticed this and we ended organising our own taxi via booking.com as it was cheaper and we knew correct.

Slow service at the bar - sat there for at least 10 minutes before someone came to server us even though there were at least 3 members of staff around the area and no other customers.

Sometimes the room wasn't cleaned until after 4 pm which was generally the time we would go back after a day exploring.

On checkout the reception confirmed that everything has been paid and nothing else was needed l, however 5 minutes after we left and were sitting having our breakfast a payment of 250 dollars was taken out the account without prior warning or authorisation and we received no receipt. Eventually we had to email the hotel for clarification of what this was (resort fee but we assumed it was already as part of the hotel fee as it was taken on check in as other customers had who were infront of us)

Also the "resort fee" or 40 dollars is obscene for basically what equated to 2 bottles of water a day.

Also 5 business days since we checked out and still no deposit has been returned as stated would be by receptionist in 3-5 working days

title: Piacevolissima scoperta
text: Siamo state benissimo in questo Hotel, sia per posizione che per servizi (pulizia, reception). Silenzioso, camere ampie, letti comodi, bagno ed accessori adeguati, comfort perfetto. Anche le richieste extra soddisfatte con estrema sollecitudine. A presto, spero...

title: Recomendadisimo!
text:
Nuestra estancia estuvo de lo mejor! En general los espacios del hotel ordenados y la decoración muy de acuerdo al estilo. 
La habitación aunque un poco chica, muy cómoda y con las amenidades perfectas!
Especial agradecimiento a Jeudy quien nos recibió en recepción y resolvió nuestras inquietudes al momento del registro, siempre con una sonrisa!
En general el personal muy amable, desayuno delicioso y la mejor actitud de los meseros en el restaurante!
Gracias por sus atenciones!!

title: Hotel confortável e acolhedor para uma visita relaxante em Nova Iorque.
text: Hotel confortável e com bom ambiente. Limpo e com funcionários simpáticos. Bem localizado, proximos de estação de comboio  Penn station e estação de metro. Zona com bons restaurantes. O pequeno almoço é a carta, no restaurante Wilson, com acesso pelo interior do hotel. Dispõem de aprox 8 opções, contudo a qualidade é boa.

title: Excelente opción para hospedarte en New York
text: Me costo un poco decidirme por este hotel ya que hay algunos comentarios negativos, mi experiencia fue genial, el personal super amable, el hotel es bastante lindo y la ubicación excepcional, sólo a 1 cuadra del metro, te puedes desplazar para cualquier lado con bastante facilidad, además que cuentan con 2 bicicletas, las cuales las puedes utilizar cuando quieras (el costo ya está incluido).

title: Amazing - Will be back
text:
I had such a wonderful stay at this hotel!  The front entrance is so cute and I love how the hotel looks hidden away. It’s so close to everything and in walking distance to most main attractions. 

The rooms were so nice and clean! The staff was so accommodating and nice. The view from the room was just stunning. When checking in, I was greeted by Gia. She was so sweet and helpful and went above and beyond to ensure my first time in NYC was amazing and it absolutely was. Big shout out to her!! 

I will definitely be coming back. ☺️

title: Excellent Value and Great Service
text: Innside is at the top of my list of great value hotels in New York. Everything about the experience is top notch. I was able to get a room with a city view which made the experience even better. The staff is exceptionally friendly and accommodating.

title: Hidden gem
text: This is truly a hidden gem. The hotel has a lovely restaurant and lots of on-site amenities (gym, bikes for guest use, in room bar included with hotel stay.) My room was clean and stocked with everything I needed. The hotel is well lit and inviting. Great for solo use, couples, business, family, and friend events .

title: Crashing friends work week!!!
text: Hector was awesome with our late checkin. Great spirit and customer service patient.  Rooms were clean, great water pressure.  Free water!!! Loved all the places to take pictures. Clean beds.  Small rooms but cozy.  Good TV line-up. Will be back.

title: Great experience, attentive and professional staff!
text: A wonderful boutique hotel in a great location and staff that goes above and beyond! Jasenia and Suzy at the front desk were so helpful from the moment we arrived! In fact, we had messed up our reservation and Jasenia took care of it and resolved the issue within moments.  We so enjoyed our girls getaway while staying at the INNSide NY Nomad!

title: Impeccable Service
text: This serves to commend on the excellent service rendered by your friendly hotel’s staff during our stay Jan. 26-28, 2024. We were there to celebrate a birthday and everything was handle with ease. The room allocations were done with effortless ease as we arrived there. The front desk staff Jestin, Jasenia, Kima and Azuceria (sp) did an outstanding job in ensuring that the rooms were in order and cleaned. The impeccable service and hospitality of your staff made our stay most enjoyable. We were very impressed by the responsiveness of staff from the planning stage till the end of our stay.  What is most commendable is that numerous requests were all but acceded. Additionally, the food served was highly sumptuous as we had a great time indulging in the array of varieties.

title: Best weekend ever
text: I would like to tip my hat off to Justin, Kima, Jasenia, and Azucera. They made my stay so wonderful.  It was a three days weekend trip, and every day was excellent.  Justin ck us in, and Jasenia ck us out. And between the days coming down for breakfast to helping us use the subway. Oh the mattress was the best from being at home. Thanks

title: Bellissima struttura, pulita ed accogliente!
text: Posizione ottima, camere grandi ed accoglienti, pulizia e cambio delle asciugamani tutte le mattine. Ottimo anche il servizio mini bar incluso nel soggiorno. Letto soffice. Doccia molto ampia. Veramente tutto bellissimo!

title: One of the best hotel experiences in NYC in a while
text: Phenomenal staff - the checkin experience was warm yet quick - when have I ever had that in NYC?? I forgot her name but I think it started with an A and was not a very common name. Great attitude! The lady who helped us with the meeting rooms was also very kind and service-minded. As well as the gentleman in the striped suit helping me check out. Perfect service! In addition to that the food in the restaurant - both breakfast and in-room dining was amazing. The room's cleanliness and modern yet not too "impersonal" atmosphere stood out among all other hotel experiences I've had over the years in NYC. I will gladly come back to this hotel and truly enjoy my stay - not something I can say for most other hotels in Manhattan.

title: My experience in INNSiDE by Melia New York NOMAD
text: My stay in the hotel was very nice! Excellent management (GM Mauricio is a professional guy, with great experience) , friendly and helpful staff (Sasenia and Jestin in reception) , clean hotel. The location is perfect with nice restaurants, near Herald Square and Macy shopping center.

title: Muito caro pra o que entrega
text: Eu achei esse hotel um custo benefício não muito bom mas gostaria de destacar o atendimento excepcional da Paola e da Jacenia que foram nota 1000 e fizeram com que eu me sentisse muito mais feliz aqui no hotel, muito obrigado ☺️

title: BRF 2024
text: Minha estadia foi excelente! Fui super bem atendida pela Josenia e Jestin, muito simpáticos, prestativos, me deram várias dicas e o principal tiveram muita paciência 🤣. O Hotel é limpo e confortável . Me hospedaria novamente com certeza.

title: Such a nice hotel - service is seriously outstanding (reps up to Jasinia!)
text:
Please read this entire review… 
Firstly, this place is so chic! It’s a lovely almost “boutique” style hotel with a really nice entrance, super warm and cosy. The rooms are not the biggest, but super cosy with really nice bathrooms, and to be honest if you’re doing NYC correct… you shouldn’t be in the hotel a lot anyway and it’s perfect for exactly what you need. However, above all else this hotel offers, they’ve somehow found the best staff in the city. I swear I didn’t get service like this at any other place, I’ve been to many other hotels in many other countries and this place really does go above and beyond for you. From the DJ’s who control the elevator music to the security guards and cleaners, everyone is so so nice.
I want to give a special shout-out to Jasinia (really hope i spelt that right), as she is seriously good at her job (understatement). She’s so patient and attentive and sent up whatever I needed and more. I asked for 2 herbal teas and got 20! There was a small mix up with the resort fee which I’d recommend you read up on if you’re going to stay at Meliá, however, Jasinia was calm and collected when explaining this and offered her apologies for the mix-up despite the issue having nothing to do with her. Management if you’re reading, please promote/give this lovely lady a pay-rise. 
All in all - don’t second guess it if you wanna stay here, top place & that’s from a Londoner with very high standards :).

title: 100% Recomendable
text: El hotel espectular, moderno, implecable. La ubicación es PERFECTA, a media cuadra del subte. El personal del hotel te hace sentir como en casa desde que llegas al mostrador, además las instalaciones están muy bien cuidadas y nuevas, Tienes incluido el uso de bicicletas y en las habitaciones bebidas en el frigobar (agua mineral y aguas saborizadas), café y más, las cuales van reponiendo. Tienen plancha, buen secador de pelo y paraguas. Tiene un muy lindo restaurante y ademas un sector con mesas y sillones donde puedes llevarte para comer lo que compres afuera. 100% recomendable.

title: A nice place to stay in NYC
text:
I was booked a room here for a work trip and had never heard of this brand before. I was fine with it as all of my traveling colleagues would be staying here too. 

Upon arrival, I was greeted warmly by Jasenia. It was a great interaction and I could tell she loves her job. She greeted me with a bottle of wine, chocolates, and all the information I needed about my stay. Apparently, the mini-bar is complimentary and restocked daily. 

We ate at the Wilson, as a very large group, during our stay. The food was good, but there were some issues getting it out on time and keeping the serving area stocked with food, but in the end it all worked out. We stayed fed and happy. 

This was a nice surprise in the heart of Chelsea and I’d be very happy to stay here again for both work and business trips.

title: Great experience at every step of the way.
text: I loved this spot--quiet, clean, funky but not overwhelmingly so. Room is a good size, beds comfortable and location is great right near a subway. The best part is the staff however: my sincere gratitude to Denzel, Paola and Azucena for having me check in laughing and check out smiling at a great experience.

title: Great mid-town hotel in NYC Chelsea area with a restaurant, wellness center and great staff.
text:
Liked this mid town hotel and so conveniently located. This is in the NYC Chelsea area with a restaurant, wellness center and great staff. Jason Azucena & staff were so helpful throughout.

There is a good restaurant, wellness center and you can walk to the local subway going almost anywhere in Manhattan, just steps away.

title: Best front desk experience!
text: I called the hotel to ask a question before I checked in and was greeted by the friendliest voice. When I checked in, the same woman (Jasenia) recognized my name/voice from the earlier call. She was so friendly and nice and I told her I was excited to stay at the hotel just because of her! Hotel is clean, room is spotless and the  bed is very comfortable. I will definitely stay here again! Everyone is so nice at this hotel.

title: A No-Brainer...!
text: My singular complaint is that the mattress is good, not great. Not a single other thing to note as negative. Spacious room and bathroom. Excellent service, house-keeping, in-room amenities (soda, water, coffees, etc.) and the most friendly, helpful staff. I go out of my way to stay here... especially since I can bring my dog!

title: Voyage janvier 2024
text: Ensemble satisfaisant . L’hôtel est très bien situé avec une bonne ambiance. Cependant nous avons trouver qu’il manquait d’équipement et de service essentiel pour le bon déroulement de notre séjour. Merci

title: Consistently clean and updated but a bit pricey
text:
This hotel consistently has clean rooms which are very well-maintained and updated. I appreciate this because I can't say this about all hotels. And that is why I spend more than at other hotels.

However, there are several fees which are NOT easily seen upon booking. Firstly, there is a tax that is paid upon arrival (in addition to what you pay when booking). Mine was $49.50 for ONE night (I think this is new; I've stayed here 3 times prior and don't remember seeing this). This is in addition to the "resort" fee of $35. There are other hotel chains that charge this fee so it is not unique to Melia and it is usually buried or in small print when booking. I think these practice should be illegal, but I'm sure some lobbyist has convinced politicians this is acceptable and ethical, which it is not.

The restaurant did not provide the best service when I was there. Firstly, my latte arrived after my meal was delivered. And when the meal was delivered, there was no question about needing anything else. There was no salt on the table, for example. For a $19 omelet and a $6 latte I expect better.

title: Well…
text:
Instrad of sounding like a spoiled whiner I will divide this experience in + and -!

+ 

Central
Nice Lobby/Reception
Friendly and helpful staff (and some not)
Nespresso in the room
Free sodas in the mini fridge
Comfortable bed and bedding.

-

Scetchy air conditioning ( stayed more than once and the same thing. Winter and waking up to a faulty heeting. Making the room icecold).
Problems with plumbing (Nyc) No hot water in the shower. Only luke warm. Nice when you step out in your icecold room. NOT comfortable.
Staff cannot help because maintanence does not start work until later. A monday morning????

Bottom line. Ok because most of the staff and a fresh vibe, but things like temperature is kindof important for a comfortable stay.

title: The heart in the heart of Chelsea ❤️
text:
Absolutely beautiful hotel, right in the middle of the Chelsea district. A few walking minutes away from Korea Town ( my highlight!). Time square, Madison garden , Empire State Building and even the Rockefeller Center where within a 20 minute walking distance. 
The hotel itself was like an oasis after the cold and drafty weather  outside. The lobby smelled wonderful 🌸 Really made you feel at ease and welcomed. 
The staff was amazing there as well! Everyone really gave it their all to make you feel welcomed and cared for. 

Especially  Paola and Denzel really helped me out after my flight got cancelled and pushed to a very late time. Again, thank you both very much!! What followed was a 24 hour trip to get back home. So I was more than glad that I was able to rest some more at the hotel prior to that disaster 🙏

I’ll definitely come back here again! 
Loved it :)

title: Lovely building
text: Be prepared to get stung with an extra $350 fee depending on how long you stay when you walk in the door. Th rooms were very well laid out and bed was comfortable. The adjoins in rooms were excellent for my children to be able to have a sense of being connected while providing some privacy. Um fellas came in handy.

title: The best kept secret in NYC
text:
Azucena made my birthday celebration a memorable one with goodie bag, chocolates and a voucher for free breakfast (which was a delicious) The INNSiDE Hotel New York is top notch-with kind, attentive staff and complimentary bike rentals.
INNSiDE Hotel is hip and modern with immaculately clean rooms, stellar service from the concierge, bartenders, waitstaff, and even the housekeeping. The staff at this place are exceptionally attentive, thoughtful, prompt to address any issue or request, and very welcoming in a city of grumpy New Yorkers. The INNSIDE by Melia New York Hotel is a peaceful, clean, and fabulous oasis where the staff goes above and beyond.

 * This is my second stay at the INNSIDE. My last trip was lovely, and the staff was terrific, too, so this isn't a one-off interaction.

title: Excelente experiencia, súper recomendable
text: Yo soy viajero frecuente y pocas veces te encuentras con un hotel que lo tenga todo y no me refiero solo las amenidades, el personal del hotel te hace sentir como en casa desde el llegas al mostrador, además las instalaciones están muy bien cuidadas y nuevas, la cama increíble y en el costo del facility fee te incluye uso de bicicleta y te ponen bebidas en el frigobar, café y más ,Nos dejó 100% satisfechos y agradezco a Héctor Jestin por su amabilidad, corridos y excelente atención en mostrador

title: VACACIONES AÑO NUEVO
text: hotel con buena ubicación, pero con falta de mantencion de líquidos en el minibar, además como sugerencia, seria bueno que tuvieran snack en el minibar y no solo liquidos, así ayuda al viajero a no estar comprando tanto en los locales, y que este costo estubiera dentro del costo de la habitación.

title: Tolles Stadthotel an einem pulsierenden Ort
text: Freundlichkeit, guter Service und tolles Ambiente in zentraler Lage von New York City. Wir konnten nach den vielen Unternehmungen im Hotel entspannen und genießen. Auch die vielen kulturellen Gäste geben dem Hotel eine angenehme Atmosphäre. Wir kommen gerne wieder.

title: The best staff
text: Everything is perfect here. Jestin & Hector are both very helpful and polite. They always make my stay here very comfortable and pleasant. he accommodations are beautiful. It couldn't have been better.

title: Great stay
text: Fabulous stay here. Hotel was clean and very central. Staff were amazing. Special mention to Jestin who looked after us fabulously along with Kma and Jusenia. Will return. Really added to our New York Experience staying here.

title: Great hotel experience
text:
Large, spacious rooms and double beds for children, king size for us. Ambient room lighting and decent facilities as well as pleasant restroom facilities.
Would have liked a kettle in the room to make a proper cup of tea - and also hadn't previously been made aware of a nightly surcharge for the room ($40); overall a lovely place to stay in a great location.

title: Great stay
text: All around great experience . Location was amazing as was service . In room amenities were awesome and we will definitely stay there again soon. Comfortable stylish and a great vibe overall . Would stay again

title: A true example of hospitality
text: I came on a solo trip and left with friends! This hotel was absolutely amazing, from start to finish. The staff (Denzel, Tiffany, and Jacenia) were accommodating. They allowed me to check in early and made sure my fridge in my room was fully stocked at all times. Can’t wait to come back !

title: Posizione perfetta
text: Ottima location per ogni tipo di visita nei luoghi piu interessanti, hotel silenzioso, ben organizzato, buon servizio, ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo, il nostro soggiorno in famiglia (avevamo due stanze), si è rivelato un successo di organizzazione.

title: Incredible service
text: My company held an event at the Wilson and our team stayed at INNSIDE.  The staff put up with my relentless requests for help, answered a hundred questions with patience and grace.  Denzel, Leslie and Christina were incredible.

title: Muy bien situado, muy buenas habitaciones
text:
Fuimos en familia. Para mi era la segunda vista, tenía muy buenos recuerdos y efectivamente no estaba equivocado. Muy bien situado, te permite caminar hacia el norte o el sur, y recorrer Manhattan a pié. De todas formas tiene una parada de metro a 100 metros.
Nosotros solo teníamos alojamiento, pero desayunamos todos los días en el hotel, y al no tener contratado el desayuno, éste te lo sirven en el restaurante, está bien pero muy corto. No es buffet, es por platos. Todo muy rico pero bueno, caro para lo que es. Al llevar niñas preferimos desayunar ahí y después salir de caminata.
Pero bueno, buen hotel.

title: Awesome service and clean
text: The entire staff here, Jason, Christina, Lima, Juan, Jasenia, are wonderful and treat you so professionally. They take care of you. The room is always spotless, I stay at least twice a year here, it would be more if I could! I love their endless supply of water to drink, the restaurant inside the hotel, room service, just about everything. You won’t regret staying here!

title: Pre-Christmas break at fantastic Hotel!
text:
Super Hotel in great location - easy to walk to lots of places but nice and quiet at night and away from the hustle and bustle that comes with NY. 
Staff couldn't have been nicer - shout-out to the lovely Denzel, who made us feel so welcome on arrival and also to Juan who was super-helpful with looking after our luggage on last day.
Rooms lovely and clean and some really nice little touches (like an Umbrella for bad weather and a yoga mat, if you fancy doing spot of stretching!). Would definitely stay here again.

title: Kind personnel and great hotel
text: Great hotel, all in real good conditions (although bed could be better), nice welcoming lobby with a DJ at nights. All personnel are cool, however The best has been Denzel at front desk, kind and diligent, making our stay a great experience. Thanks!

title: Very satisfied
text:
We had and excellent stay at the Innside.
Our room was immaculate.
Good location on a most accessible street
I most appreciated the professionalism and courtesies of the front desk and  Leslie and Kim.

title: Great experience
text: I had an excellent time in Melia New York. The crew at the hotel was fantastic, they were always available for whatever my family needed. Overall people at reception were awesome. I'd like to thank to all of them, overall to Jestin Perez, Leslie and Jasena who gave us a great service a night that my mother needed medical care, and during the next days were following up and offering my family all type of attentions.

title: The BEST Customer Service EVER!
text: The hotel is very nice and modern.  The room was very comfortable and a good size for NYC.  The customer service is remarkable.  The entire staff goes above and beyond to help.  I had a few requests during our stay and they responded immediately and were able to help.  The elevators were extremely fast and the view is stunning from the 19th and 20th floors.  The weight room is state of the art, and the food from the restaurant is very delicious. The only thing is that they rooms are not soundproof so you do hear people talking in the hallway. I will stay here again.

title: Not sure if I would stay agsin
text: Nice room but very small for 1 adult two children the view was overlooking a old building not what I expected staff very nice and helpful but hotel rooms a bit small not what a expected the money I paid very disappointed

title: AMAZING FRONT-DESK SERVICE
text: AMAZING front-desk staff!  Azucena, Leslie, Gia, Jestin, and Denzel demonstrated their affability, kindness, and unrelenting dedication to assisting their guests from the second we walked in.  To say my friend and I were merely accommodated would be an understatement.  I can't express enough gratitude for the premiere customer service from the hotel staff.   As a fault of my own, I accidentally booked two separate rooms.    I stayed at INNsiDe for two evenings a week prior to Christmas.   The staff went above and beyond to help us figure out our room situation -- and proceeded as such with a smile on their face.   We shared some laughs throughout the process.  I STRONGLY RECOMMEND you consider staying at this hotel.   Room accommodations were clean, beautiful views from large windows, and comfortable beds.

title: Ótima localização! Hotel super confortável! Serviço excepcional!
text: Super bem localizado! Perto da 5a avenida! Metrô a uma quadra de distância! Mercado e starbucks a uma quadra de distância ! Quarto espaçoso com um chuveiro ótimo! Aquecedor e ar condicionado funcionam perfeitamente! Os funcionários são muito atenciosos! Conseguiram upgrade, late check  out e foram super prestativos com todas as solicitações que tivemos durante nossa estadia! Um obrigada especial à Jestin, Tiffany, Denzel e Geovanna! Retornarei com certeza!

title: Love the Hotel, JESTIN was awesome
text: Jestin is the  sr. Front desk manager at Mela, innside, NOMAD. Recently, when I needed to change my plans, he was incredibly helpful and handled for us what seemed nearly impossible. Jestin is a great representative of my experience with this hotel.

title: Fantastico
text: InnSiDE fue fantástico, el servicio al cliente aun mas excepcional. Los cuartos estan limpios y muy bien equipados. La esencia del hotel era impresionante y muy buen arte. Esta situado en Midtown, asi quie ofrece muy buena ubicación.

title: A winner
text: I truly enjoyed this hotel. I felt they really care about my experience. It was quiet and it was comfortable. There was a cool DJ in the lobby and the attached restaurant The Wilson also has a cool scene going as well. Many thoughtful details like water, yoga mat, friendly staff etc. I will be returning in Feb as well!

title: Perfect Experience in New York
text:
The hotel is in a convenient location a few blocks from Penn Station but out of the fray. It is all glass with great city views. We arrived around 2 and checkin is a 3. As we waited the staff handed out cartons of water. At 3 our room was ready and we had been upgraded to a suite with a balcony! The decor is mid century modern, mostly white, with retro touches. The bed was comfortable and the shower great. The hotel has fanciful bar spaces and a restaurant where we ate breakfast. The food was good.
We would definitely stay there again.

title: Customer service
text: Great customer service, except for the service phone not working and given an incorrect room, everything was almost perfect, ladies at front desk were great! And any requests for blankets and towels was there really quick

title: INNside by Melia Stay
text: Every single employee was welcoming, understanding, and very accommodating. Even the night shift employees were all very helpful. The rooms were good for the price. Stayed in the family loft & was spacious enough for 6 girls with lots of luggages. They give free water refills / mini bar refills. The rooms were clean & the location was perfect. They have a hotel restaurant/ bar that is very modern and cute. Would definitely recommend!

title: Por debajo de las espectativas
text: El precio es muy superior a lo que ofrecen, la ubicación es buena, bocas de metro al lado, el servicio del desayuno pésimo, cama cómoda, habitación normal, limpieza mal y mal olor en la habitación. En resumen, un hotel mediocre a precio medio alto.

title: Ubicación y personal
text: He estado alojada unos dias en este hotel,todo perfecto,ubicación cerca de los lugares emblemáticos, con la línea 1 del metro llegas en 5 minutos a time square,y a 15 al puerto para coger el ferry a la estatua de la libertad,y queda a 2 minutos del hotel caminando, pero lo mejor a sido el magnífico personal del hotel,sobretodo en el departamento de recepción donde cada uno de ellos te hace sentir como en casa, en especial agradecimiento a jestin siempre atento y mirando al detalle que todo estuviera bien,paola un 10 de persona siempre sonriendo, Héctor,jasenia, muchas gracias por hacer de nuestras vacaciones una bonita experiencia

title: High standards met with 'room' to spare!
text:
I can NOT say enough about my experience at INNSiDE. I had just left another hotel after a truly abysmal experience, and I needed saving; INNSiDE Concierge Leslie did so and then some. After spending years in the industry, I can confirm that good service is a blend of skill and talent. Well, a perfect example of both, Leslie sized me up in seconds and provided perfect service throughout our interaction. I was clearly anxious that this hotel would be another disaster, but I was quickly reassured and more than satisfied just a few minutes in. Then, like a warm hug, Leslie continued to take steps to make me feel welcomed and appreciated. 

After check-in, my experience has been as close to perfect as possible. The amenities offer elegant opulence minus decadence. Everything you need, nothing you don't. I love it. The gym, fully equipped, is on the top floor with a picture window overlooking the city, a brilliantly simple step too few hotels take. The music throughout the hotel is catchy without being intrusive. The space is urban chic, clean and sleek. 

I honestly don't think I've ever had a better experience at a hotel. Thanks guys. I'm in NYC regularly, and I don't think I'll risk going anywhere else again.

title: Our hotel stay
text: the experience was just  okayy over all, we were just disappointed with the view from our room. The staff was very accommodating. They did refill our waters everyday which was great. They did house keeping everyday.

title: Awesome stay and experience!  Staff was amazing.
text: We had such a great stay at INNside and the staff was so friendly and helpful.  Thank you for treating Sequoia so well, and for making our stay in the city a great one.  Highly recommend this hotel!  It was central to so many attractions, and had a great restaurant and bar.

title: Just book with them ! You won’t regreat
text: Everything was so perfect , only thing about our room is that there was the door connection with next door room .   You can hear everything ( hard to keep it quiet on a couple trip , sorry for them ) lol

title: Okay hotel, just average
text: Streetscape not welcoming. Huge trash receptacle in the front - can see from the front-facing rooms. Beds are very noisy. Rooms not soundproofed well - can head everything from the outside hallways. Hot water not always available in the shower. Shower not the cleanest: figures had mold and mineral buildup. found hair from previous guests in the bathroom, was gross. Funky odor lingers in the room, suggesting carpet not the cleanest. Charge an amenity fee of ~$45, yet there are no report amenities (was told its for the "free" in room drinks and bike rental, otherwise no pool, ect). Will not stay again

title: Excelente servicio y ubicación
text: Excelente servicio ubicación todo muy cerca calidad limpieza muy confortable el personal muy amable en todo momento siembre llegamos al Melia sobre todo en Europa se mantiene a la vanguardia  gran hotel gran servicio

title: A Splendid Hotel in the Heart of Midtown Manhattan!
text: From the moment I stepped into the lobby and was greeted by amazing staffers Leslie, Isaac, and Christina I just had the best hotel experience I could have hoped for. No question or request was too trivial and ALWAYS greet with a smile and helpful advice. I cannot say enough about how wonderful an experience my wife and I had...to say nothng of how clean the rooms were, how great the location was, and the amenities were...I have found my new hotel for whenever I travel to NYC.

title: DECEPCIONANTE
text:
No reúne las características de un hotel de la cadena Meliá en España.
Lo único bueno es su ubicación.
Decepción ante un hotel en el que se tenían puestas muchas expectativas, falta de empatía con el cliente, eternas colas para el desayuno, noches ruidosas con fiestas para personas no alojadas,.....

title: Una decepción con nombre español
text:
Uan empresa española que me ha decepcionado profundamente tras dejarme en NY sin dinero en mi tarjeta por un error de un cargo emitido por ellos de 521$ en el momento del check in. 
Han sido incapaces de ayudarme aun habiéndoles enseñado que me han dejado 5 dias con 60€. 
Ninguna solucion mas que decir que como era una transaccion internacional, el dinero me lo tiene que devolver el banco. 
Sitio ruidoso, por ma tarde no se puede hablar en la recepción. Organizan afterworks con musica a todo trapo y no dejan descansar aun estando en el tercer piso.

title: Awesome stay
text: Absolutely fantastic stay at Inside by Melia, and Denzel made it even more memorable! Impeccable service and a personal touch that elevated the experience. The room was clean, and the added yoga mat was a thoughtful touch. Denzel's awesome hospitality truly stood out. Highly recommend for a top-notch getaway!

title: Solid choice in Chelsea
text: The hotel lobby and bar is fun and inviting. The room was clean but cramped. Very expected in New York. But the best part of the trip as the receptionist, Jasenia. Immediately she asked if we wanted to check our bags while waiting for the room, chatted giving advise of local hot spots and secured a late check out without any hesitation. I asked how long she had been working there and it was her first week! Thank you.

title: Great location, modern hotel and friendly team
text: Great hotel, great location. Good value for money. Would have been a 5/5 if WiFi hadn't been so terrible during our stay (technical issues) and room service was shocking (used once not again). These things didn't ruin our stay just could have been better.

title: Avoid this hotel
text:
The rooms at this hotel cannot comfortably accommodate 4 people and the service is terrible 
On arrival you will be charged an expensive service fee, without any prior warning, and the staff don’t care
The hotel overall is in a poor state of condition and I would suggest avoid at all costs

title: Nice hotel in nice spot.
text:
Modern hotel in the up and coming NoMad area. We arrived about midnight and were greeted warmly. Our room with city views was on the 14th floor and, like others, we felt the prospect of a skyscraper skyline was over promised and under-delivered although the view would be better from higher floors. Our room though was of good size with decent storage and a lovely shower. We were given water on demand at reception, although you do have to pay a resort fee for services like this and for the top floor gym which we didn't use.
We were given vouchers for breakfast in the Wilson restaurant which included OJ and coffee plus a choice of main dish (we'll leave a photo) which were all very nice. We also enjoyed an evening meal in the Wilson which was well presented and enjoyable.
Hotel is well located with easy access to tourist sites, the subway, restaurants, shopping (eg Macy's) and Madison Square Garden but in a relatively quiet neighbourhood. 
Staff in both the hotel and restaurant were helpful and friendly. We enjoyed our stay.

title: Fantastic Stay!
text: Family trip staying in 2 rooms with no complaints! Some of the comfiest beds we’ve slept in, lovely service and very welcoming staff!! The location is great as it’s not too noisy but within walking distance to lots of sights, if not the metro is also very close by! Would definitely recommend and consider for another trip back to NYC!

title: Literie pas adaptée
text:
Hôtel pas adapté avec des enfants !

Les chambres sont petites et surtout il n'y a pas dans cet hôtel de petits lits.

Ce n'est que des lits double mais de taille mini.

Mes enfants de 10 et 12 ans n'ont pu dormir ensemble dans le même lit car le lit double était si petit qu'ils n'arrivaient pas à dormir !
Je suis allé à la réception leur demander une chambre avec deux petits lits pour palier au problème. 
Ils m'ont dit qu'il n'y avait pas de petits lits dans l'établissement ! 

Donc un de mes fils a dormi parterre durant tout le séjour, l'hôtel n'avait pas non plus de petit matelas à nous fournir.

Je trouve lamentable qu'un établissement 4 étoile soit incapable de comprendre et de trouver une solution.
 Il me semble que c'est tout de même le minimum pour un hôtel 4* d'avoir un hébergement adapté à la clientèle.

title: The kindest staff I’ve met
text: The room is lovely, quiet and comfortable with many thoughtful amenities. But the thing that sets this hotel apart are the staff. Jaseni, Azycena & Jestin made my night after a long day. Their kindness meant so much to me after a long day or work and travel (only to be up early the next day).  Check in was smooth, they made up a gift bag for me and told me their favorite items on the menu in the restaurant. The room was so neat and tidy and very cozy! Thank you! I will absolutely return here for future business—you have a lifelong customer now!

title: Thank you to Jasenia and Suzy
text:
My Mom and I had a wonderful stay thanks to Jasenia’s amazing hospitality and recommendations for getting around NYC and Suzy’s great service! Thank you for everything. 
The hotel’s location is ideal for getting to the subway and navigating through NYC.

title: Girls Trip
text: I stayed here with my 11 year old daughter and we felt very welcomed and safe. The staff is warm and the hotel is clean and nice. We enjoyed breakfast at the Wilson one morning and loved dinner with a great city view with room service one night. My drink from the bar was excellent!! We will definitely stay here again!

title: Great hotel in New York
text: I was very happy with my experience here. From the fantastic staff who were super friendly and helpful to the clean and bright rooms it was a great stay. The room was a good size for a New York hotel room and the bed was super comfy. Location is great too - 6 minute walking to Penn Station and very central for getting around. Highly recommend.

title: No debería de ser un Melia
text: Al llegar nos querían cobrar más de lo que teníamos reservado y desperdiciamos tiempo en recepción, no les funcionaba para pagar el sistema, el olor de las fundas de las almohadas era como a cerrado, el desayuno no hay bufet por lo que si tienes que comer cosas por alegrías, intolerancias, etc…nada recomendable.

title: Will not stay here again
text: Uncomfortable curvy beds. Amenities were not replenished in the room. Hair was still on the bathroom floor which wasn’t cleaned during our 4 nights stay. Beware of the extra $45 they they try to add to your bill which was never mentioned in the reservation.

title: Meliá the apple of my eye!!! Wonderful BFF  Trip
text: The magic of the holidays was fulfilled with our stay at The Innside New York . Everything was perfect from the first step inside of the beautifully decorated lobby filled with amazing tunes !!! The customer service was top tier! Gia Sebastian Issac and rounding it out with Kima!! I’m sitting in the beautiful outside space right now ..listening to  Nushooz “I can’t wait “ I can’t wait to come back and check all the Melia brand has to offer!

title: Gran experiencia
text:
Estuvimos 5 noches hospedados en INNSIDE NOMAD Ny y la experiencia fue increíble.
En el checkin nos atendió Paola y fue súper simpática y profesional. Paola hizo su magia 
y nos asignó habitación en el piso 19. ¡¡Las vistas que teníamos de la ciudad eran espectaculares!! 
Las habitaciones son amplias y tienen justo lo que necesitas: agua, algún jugo, café y té ilimitado. Zapatillas y albornoz para estar cómodos, plancha, secador y gel, champú y crema corporal que huelen muy bien. 
También teníamos el desayuno incluido y la verdad que nos encantó. Tienen un menú con 8 opciones (si no me equivoco) y buena variedad. Por supuesto, café, te y zumo de naranja ilimitado. Lo perfecto para comenzar el día! 
En general todo en el hotel nos encantó pero destaco al personal Tiffany, Leslie, Jasenia, Jestine y Sebastián. Nos hicieron sentir como es casa. 
Y un buen punto es la música que pone el Dj que está en el lobby por las tardes, súper buen ambiente y que suene lo mismo en los ascensores es genial. 
Sin duda volveremos ;)

title: Best stay in ny
text: Great room great stay great staff in particular leshie jason. Private terrace with wonderful with over manhattan. Everything new and well equipped. I will surely be back. Melia quality. Thank you everyone

title: Gran experiencia
text:
Hotel muy bien situado. La habitación era amplia y moderna. El personal muy amable, desayuno bueno y abundante, a la carta o si contratas el desayuno con una carta más reducida.
Metro Penn station muy cercanoMuy recomendable

title: Se vuelve
text:
Hermoso hotel, excelente el personal y la calidad humana, lo mismo que la predisposición para con las personas.
El servicio de taxi al aeropuerto puntual y amables. Muy buena ubicación y genial el personal

title: Fantastic experience and excellent value!
text:
Innside is consistently an excellent stay. Staff - Jestin, Tiffany, Leslie, Jasenia, Kima, Christina, Paola, Hector and team - are always a pleasure to see & work with. They make all aspects of being at the hotel an easy and enjoyable experience. 
The rooms are lovely and the vibe is great.  Wholeheartedly recommend the hotel!

title: Muy recomendable
text: Una localización idílica. Penn Station al lado prácticamente del Hotel y lo suficiente cerca y lejos de Times Square para poder disfrutarlo sin tener el bullicio encima. La habitación increíble, en especial la cama. Y el personal del hotel encatador, en especial el personal de recepción, el cuál es amable y servicial. Recomendable 100%

title: Excelente!!
text:
El personal de recepción es encantador, te ayudan ante cualquier duda que tengas de la ciudad y están encantados de informarte
Leslie/Christina/ Seba son súper atentos con los clientes .Una semana para recordar
Muy recomendable su ubicación.

title: Excelente Hotel Innside by Melia
text: Excelente hotel, tudo muito limpo e organizado. Comemos uma massa deliciosa no restaurante do hotel. É muito bem localizado. Tudo cheiroso e com música boa. Em especial quero agradecer os colaboradores Christina, Leslie and Sebastian. A Christina uma educação e preocupação em nos ajudar. Por vezes tivemos dificuldade em m nos expressar e ela utilizou um aplicativo de tradução simultânea e numa grande disposição em nos ajudar! Christina Querida, muito obrigada pela recepção e pela ajuda! Amamos tudo no Hotel e com certeza voltaremos 💜

title: ESPECTACULAR HOTEL
text: Mucha amabilidad, Leslie y Sebastian genios, mucha buena onda y amabilidad en su atención.- El hotel brinda agua y sodas saborizadas de manera gratuita, la habitación cuenta con un frigobar y máquina de cafe nespresso que también es gratis para recuperar energías. La habitación es moderna. Desayunamos y estuvo genial... riquísimo. La ubicación es genial, ya que estas cerca de todo.-

title: Perfect location!
text: Location is outstanding, with 2 subway stations very close by. Breakfast at the restaurant was very good and the service impeccable. Coffee is delicious! The front desk staff were very friendly despite having a line up most of the time. It’s.a busy lobby! After a mix up with our room, we got upgraded to the 1 bedroom with a balcony! Just wow! It’s an outstanding room! Would return for sure!

title: Great hotel with some limitations
text: We spent Thanksgiving in NYC with our 2 teen daughters and chose to stay in the "family loft" at the INNside. It is basically 2 connecting rooms, which was a bit different than expected, but worked well for us and gave our family a bit of privacy while also ensuring the kids were safe and secure. The rooms were nice, clean and we appreciated the lux vinyl flooring over carpet. The clientele was absolutely European and we heard many languages being spoken. It would have been nice if there was more "lobby" space to hang out and if the bar had been open later into the evening. The available common space was in a glass greenhouse-type space with overhead heaters, with hard plastic/wood tables and chairs. There were a couple of couches right at the entrance but not very conducive to hanging out. We played cards one night in the glass area after sightseeing and the manager kindly turned the heaters on for us when requested. We had purchased the breakfast upgrade at the Wilson restaurant onsite and would probably not do so again. The food and options were very good, but the service was not and the host/manager was not friendly at all. We definitely felt that those of us with the breakfast vouchers were not looked upon and treated as well as customers coming in without vouchers. If INNside is partnering with/housing the Wilson onsite, it would be good if they aligned with the same level of service we received from the hotel staff, which were kind, welcoming and attentive.

title: Excellent experience
text: It a very good place, it's a peaceful place, good for travel with family. Have a restaurant that have a good breakfast, and the staff is very nice.  I like the location, the train station it at 6 minute walking distance.

title: Absolutely first-rate customer service!
text: This is a cozy hotel in midtown with easy access to uptown subway stations.  The room was really compact, but very clean and environmentally conscious in design. The breakfast included in our stay exceeded our expectations in taste and choices.  This is not your typical hotel continental breakfast. Loved the GUS sodas and water provided for us with no extra charge. By far the best part of all--we were taken care of by the most fabulous group of people at the front desk, especially Leslie, Jasenia, and Gia. So kind, so helpful!!! They were exceptional and went out of their way to make sure our stay was great.  We will be back!

title: Voyage entre amie
text:
Par où commencer ? Au début, il y a eu un soucis entre ce que notre agence de voyage nous avait "promis" et ce qu'on a eu, en allant simplement parler avec le personnel de l'hôtel, le problème a été résolu :D
Nous avons régulièrement été demandé des conseils pour des restaurants, pour le métro, ainsi que pour certaines activités. Tout le monde a été bienveillant et à l'écoute. Ils nous ont toujours très bien conseillé et nous ont donné de très bonne adresse !
Les soda dans la chambre étaient vraiment bon.
La qualité du matelas était incroyable ! C'est rare que je dorme aussi bien dans un lit qui n'est pas le mien.
Le service de chambre était impeccable !
Nous avons également été déjeuné une fois au restaurant de l'hôtel, tout était délicieux (même si je dois admettre que le croissant sandwich reste une aberration pour moi 🥲) 
Le Room service était également très bien.

Merci à Kima, Christina, Leslie, Jestin, David, etc. Qui ont vraiment été génial et d'une gentillesse incroyable ! Thank you ❤️

The Room 612

title: Nice stay on Manhattan
text:
Thank You Jestin, Jason, Tiffany, Jaseria, Gia, Leslie and Hector for Your friendlieness and hospitality every time I come here.
You are always very kind.
My crew is very happy our company has chosen Your hotel for our layovers.
Fresh, clean and quiet.

title: Great experience at Innside Meliá New York
text: I had the most amazing experience at. Innside Meliá New York, the staff is very friendly, besides being very well located (half a block from the subway), Justin, Juan, Tiffany and Jason went above an beyond for me to have not only a great experience at the hotel but made my thanksgiving night very very special with their kind and warm service.

title: Un muy buen hotel, con una muy buena ubicacion.
text: Hotel muy recomendable, muy bien situado, buenas habitaciones, buena limpieza y destacar la calidad de sus empleados. Excelente atencion en recepcion, destacar a la recepcionista Leslie, amable servicial y con un trato al cliente excelente, un diez como profesional. En la valoracion general no lo valoro como excelente por el WiFi, cuando lo mejoren, sin duda mi valoracion sera excelente.

title: Não condiz com preço nem com o padrão Meliá
text: Móveis velhos, inclusive nossa mesinha quebrou. A maçaneta também quebrou. Quarto simples, me lembrou um Ibis. Muito longe de ser um 4 estrelas. Peço preço, teria ficado em hotéis que já conheço em NY e são infinitamente melhores.

title: Albergo spettacolare
text: Hotel ottimamente posizionato, a due passi dal Madison Square Garden e pochi minuti sia da Times Square sia dalla 5th Avenue. La struttura offre tutte le comodità, compreso un ristorante “The Wilson” (peraltro ottimo ed anche bello da vedere) al pian terreno. Stanze molto accoglienti, “stilose” e dotate di ogni comodità, oltre che silenziose. Personale molto cortese e disponibile. Veramente consigliato per il vostro soggiorno a New York City.

title: Great location, rooms are just ok.
text: One whole wall of the bathroom is smoked glass, so when you turn on the bathroom light, it illuminates the entire bedroom. Not great when you have to get up in the middle of the night to use the bathroom when you have your significant other in the room as well. Also, you can hear noise from the hallways in the rooms very easily.

title: La mejor situación y el mejor servicio
text:
Situación inmejorable en Manhattan y un servicio muy atento y amable. En la habitación hay cafetera Nespresso y nevera, te van reponiendo las cápsulas y el agua que vas consumiendo. 
Nos han ayudado con todo lo que hemos necesitado y hay muchos recepcionistas que hablan español.

title: Meliá es garantía
text:
Gran hotel, muy bien situado entre la 6 y la 7.
Habitaciones amplias, teníamos una cuádruple con camas muy cómodas.
No probamos el restaurante pero tenía ambiente y buena pinta.
Para repetir al menos otra vez!

title: Meliá Innside's Paula & Hector Saved Us
text:
We LOVE Meliá Innside and its staff! 

We are NYers & Meliá Innside is close to our store. On late nights or busy times of year, we stay there. Last night we were exhausted, it was really late, we didn't want to drive home to Brooklyn. We called the hotel directly, my husband spoke with Paula, she couldn't have been sweeter or more accommodating. We strolled in with our two pups at dusk, Paula & Hector took care of us, so much so we are staying a few extra days! They reminded us to hang the 'do not disturb' on the door and off to sleep we went. :)

We are consistently happy with this hotel, we have friends and family stay there when they visit NY. 
Highly recommended Meliá Innside, ask for Paula or Hector, but rest assured, whomever helps you will be great too.

title: Celebrated 10 year Anniversary!
text: My husband and I celebrated our 10th anniversary in NYC and stayed the convenient Innside by Melia hotel on 27th street. It is a great location - close to the 1 train, and walking distance to some great neighborhood spots and Chelsea Market. We were greeted by Christina who ensured we had a warm welcome and positive experience throughout our entire stay! We felt taken care of and enjoyed the accommodations offered - room service, and drinks at the cute hotel restaurant downstairs. Had a blast!

title: Great place to stay
text: My sons and I had a great stay at Innside. Everyone was friendly. Rooms were clean. Beds were comfy. Walls were good. I didn’t hear anybody else on the floor. Denzel, Christina, Azucena and Tiffany took great care of us. Also, there were a lot of food options nearby and easy access to subway stations. The rose garden was beautiful and we got a lot of good pictures. This is a great place to stay when in New York. I would definitely stay here again and recommend you stay here as well.

title: Amazing Staff and Service
text: I recently stayed at the INNSiDE and was absolutely blown away by the service provided by Leslie and Jason. I had made an error when booking my stay, and they completely saved me by helping me book an additional night and even making it so I could stay in the same room. I am so grateful for their kindness. This was a great hotel to stay at, the location was perfect and felt very safe. One more thank you to Leslie and Jason, amazing people work at this hotel!

title: Perfectly Stay at the Melia Innside Nomad
text:
We had a family suite which was essentially two large interconnecting rooms, one twin and one king, but perfect for the four of us. 

The hotel was well maintained and cleaning was excellent. Bathrooms were a little on the small side, but the walk in shower made up for that. Toiletries and amenities in the room were excellent. 

The reception team were fantastic, no little question or request was ever too difficult for them, and we felt really comfortable, safe and happy staying there. 

Location was perfect for us, just outside the hustle and bustle but close enough to walk most places, one block from the subway so it was super easy to get around, and just two blocks away was a street with lots of great restaurants which we enjoyed throughout our stay. 

This was my fifth time in NYC and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend the Melia Innside Nomad.

title: Great for business and pleasure
text: This was my third stay at the Melia Innside Nomad Hotel. I came to NYC for a business meeting, and brought my wife as well. She loved that place. Very convenient to restaurants and subways. Well located to walk anywhere. Room was comfortable and clean. DJ in lobby and live music in the restaurant. Lot's going on. Rooms are relatively quiet at night, for Manhattan. Front desk Christina & Leslie were very helpful, congenial and attentive. We enjoyed our stay and will return here when next in town.

title: Trendy Laid Back Vibe
text: Had a family suite which is two adjoining rooms for me, myself and 3 children. Room was clean and spacious. Staff were welcoming and helpful and the communal spaces were beautiful with a tonne of character. A really cool hotel with laid back vibe in a good location.
