Highly advise staying here rather than the madness of Times Square. Rosa's Pizza on the corner, big reason to stay at INNSide.

title: Excellent hotel - clean, friendly, comfy
text:
We loved our stay at INNSiDE and would highly recommend. 
- super comfy beds
- quiet location 
- welcoming lobby, smelt lovely, live DJ, buzzing atmosphere in restaurant and bar
- friendly and helpful staff
- spacious bedrooms
- great location, easy to walk to tourists places
- clean and modern
- quick lifts

title: First trip to NYC
text: An amazing stay at Innside Melia. The team so attentive to every detail. Thank you Lesley for the helpful tips . Lesley ensured our stay was first class from the minute we arrived, checking on us shortly after arrival to ensure we were settling in well. Kima, thanks for your help at the start of our second day. The resident DJ.. outstanding.  The room, cocktails, restaurant, hotel vibe and ambience outstanding. Fantastic sleep every night after long days walking and exploring.Brilliant location. My husband and youngest son loved it… the best time in NYC. Can’t wait to come back.

title: Poor management
text: The decor is lovely and it is in a great location, but I don't particularly like not being able to take a hot shower or not being able to sleep at a comfortable temperature. If there is an issue in your room, you have to wait until maintenance staff get in at 9:30 am - which is ridiculous if you have a schedule to maintain. This is the second of my two stays that have had serious maintenance issues (A/C and shower this time), and they have been unable to help because they don't have 24/7 maintenance, and they wouldn't change my room to a working one. The first time I stayed I was locked out of my room because the battery in the card reader failed, and they refused to call an emergency maintenance person even though I had medication I needed to take before bed. Instead they gave me a different room to sleep in, but I had nothing to sleep in except my work clothes, no toiletries, etc. Not to mention the security guard accused me of just being drunk and not knowing how to use a keycard, but later had to apologize when his own card wouldn't work and they discovered what the issue was. They also only supply one sheet on the bed. It felt creepy and unsanitary to only be separated by the mattress by a single flat sheet, and not have an additional sheet between you and the comforter. Lastly, the gym is kind of gross - they have a spot for cleaning wipes but it is always out (despite asking the front desk every day to have someone replace them), so if you want to disinfect your machine from someone else's sweat, you'll have to bring your own.  And of course you try to get help every single day that you're there only to be told every day that they'll put an order in, they're working on it, etc., but really they're just waiting for you to leave.

title: Second time here
text: It’s my second time here in years and this time with my now husband and it was awesome. The location is perfect as it is close to public transportation as well as a variety of restaurants, stores, and bars. Leslie and Jon helped at the front desk and were delightful. I definitely will recommend to friends.

title: Nulla di che
text: rapporto qualità prezzo molto scarso. Molto gentile il personale alla reception. Colazione appena soddisfacente. Scarse bevande e cibo scarso. Ristorante da scartare oltre che molto caro. Poco spazio per i clienti dell'hotel all'interno altrimenti fuori all'aperto

title: Ein  Kurztrip nach New York für 2 Personen
text:
auf der Suche nach einem schönen, modernen Hotel für 2 Personen für 3 Tage sind wir recht bald auf das Melia Innside NoMad gestoßen. Die Räume sind hell und einladend. 

Ausschalggebend für die Buchung war, dass die Lage gut ist (trifft zu); dass es über ein Gym verfügt (klein, aber in Ordnung) und es ein Frühstück beinhaltet (nicht zu empfehlen)..

Das Hotel würde ich zu dem Preis (3 tage 1300 Dollar) nicht noch einmal buchen. Dafür ist das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis nicht in Ordnung.

im Restaurant direkt im Hotel wird Morgens zwischen 7-10 Uhr ein Frühstück serviert. Zur Auswahl stehen ein paar kleine Gerichte für den kleinen Hunger. Wer sich auf ein Buffet freut, wird enttäuscht.

Persönlich zu empfehlen ist eigentlich nur der French Toast.. Zwar eine Kalorienbombe, aber die anderen Gerichte sind wahlweise geschmacksneutral und/oder sehr klein oder einfach noch größere Kallorienbomben.

title: Such an upper!
text:
Wonderful experience so far.  Room is great - windows OPEN which is huge, and the front desk experience was so fun.  Justin Perez, who welcomed me, was absolutely a delight.  He gave me a dinner recommendation that sounds perfect and an adventure.  The Restaurant here had an event, but looks great.

The hotel is walkable from Penn Station - a wonderful way to travel.

title: Safe and affordable
text: The staff is lovely, and the location is convenient, but room cleanliness and the quality of linens leaves a lot to be desired. For the price, it’s a good option if you’re happy with minimal frills. There are good coffee and restaurant options within 1-2 blocks in almost every direction.

title: Even Better Than We Expected!
text: This hotel blew our minds! Not just the gorgeous view, layout, small special touches, but it was something that you can’t put in a picture: the lovely staff who run this establishment. From the very start of our trip, every staff member was warm, helpful and genuinely concerned about our experience. We flew from CO and got to the hotel at 6:30 am after flying a red eye. We knew the chances were slim that we’d get to check in to our room. Hector greeted us and miraculously got us into our room, and for that we cannot explain our level of relief and gratefulness. If that was it, that paired with our room’s view and the hotel lobby and decor (and Nespresso machines would be enough. But repeatedly, every staff we’ve been in contact with made us feel at home. I’m short, I’m just sad that we ever have to leave. This hotel is a chic, hip beautiful establishment without a stuffy conceited attitude: when the pretty popular girl is actually nice! 😂 Thank you Hector, Christina, Denzel, Jestin and Cesar! We can’t wait to be back.

title: Excelente hotel
text:
Hotel excelente localização, muito limpo e funcionários atenciosos.
Tem metrô linha vermelha 1 em apenas 2 minutos a pé, bons restaurantes aos redores.
Recomendo e quando voltar para NYC, hospedarei no hotel novamente.

title: Definitely coming back!
text: My stay at The Innside was short but sooo sooo sweet. I was meet by Jonathan at the front desk, his calm and sweet demeanor was just what I needed after a long flight. The room was small but cozy and perfect my short stay. I will be back. Thanks a ton Jonathan! :)

title: Thank You Denzel
text: Travelling is stressful and unpredictable at the best of times, but sometimes an empathetic member of staff makes the trip memorable. In my case that was Denzel. His attentiveness and small kindnesses made it feel like home.  It's the people you remember most when you travel. When I think of visiting and booking a hotel, Innside New York Nomad will be my first choice because of Denzel.

title: Great place to stay in NYC!
text: Fantatsic place to stay. Clean, great staff, food, and bar. We had ages 24-78 and everyone had a blast! Everyone was so nice. Great location, centrally located. Around the corner from the Empire State Building, walking distance to the High Line and so many places. Would defintely recommend to friends and famiy.

title: Perfect Hotel for a city trip
text: Everything was perfect. Starting with the warm welcome from the staff. Jestin from the front desk really did everything to make our stay unforgettable. The rooms are nice, the beds are comfy. The shower was immediatly nice warm. We had a room on the 19th floor. From that height you can look over the neighbor buildings and have a view of the skyline. We certainly will come back again.

title: Excellent Stay!
text: Whenever I come to NYC for business I stay at Innside Melia. It's trendy, fun and eclectic. The perfect place for a young, single corporate gal to mix business and pleasure. I love the design, the service and enjoy the music and vibes coming from the Wilson. Leslie and the front desk staff are particularly awesome! Come for whimsical scene and stay for the comfy good times!

title: Hotel de cinco estrelas.
text:
Quarto duplo superior com vista. 
O que podemos descrever em relação ao hotel é quisemos ótima experiência com nossa estadia. Hospedagem em casal durante seis noite no final do mês de setembro. 
Localizado em uma área próxima a estações de diversas linhas de metrô. 
Atendimento: funcionários atenciosos com os hóspedes não falantes do inglês, limpeza e arrumação do quarto sempre bem feitos.
Possue duas academias a do vigésimo andar é exclusiva para os hóspedes do andar e possui outra jo segundo andar.
O quarto possui ferros de passar roupas, secador de cabelo, geladeira com reposição de água e suco em custo adicional e para os amantes do café o quarto possue uma cafeteira de café expresso ja com as cápsulas e chá para quem deseja. Quarto silencioso , cama confortável e com uma vista linda da cidade.

title: Personal Items not returned
text: I left a sentimental item in the room in a draw and after ringing up for 8 hours speaking to multiple people no one returned my call - finally someone rang me back - claiming the item was not in room or in lost property, This is simply not the case, either someone did not clean the room thoroughly and the next guest took the item or the cleaning team did. Either way I will not staying ever again and will be changing my reservation for my stay in a few weeks time. Extremely disappointed

title: Excellent Hotel
text: My trip was for three days, I arrived Manhattan at 6:00am and the hotel take care of my baggages without additional fees, also, they sent me a message when the room is ready (around 2:30pm). Check in easy and fast. Check out easy and fast. People are very great. Rest & Bar very great. Location: 8/10 - have  stairs to down to the subway (2 minute away from hotel).

title: Excelente!
text: Hotel con muy buena ubicación a 15 minutos a pie de Time square, subway a 50 metros del hotel, instalaciones modernas y muy limpias. Desayuno muy bueno en restaurante. Por la noche ambiente de música y tomar copa. Personal muy profesional, simpáticos y muy amables. Repetiremos.

title: Very nice hotel
text: This is a nice hotel with super professional staff,, nice rooms with good beds and decent size bathroom and a gym with a perfect view all the way down to "One World". Has its own restaurant and bar as well

title: Great Customer Service!!!
text: By far the best customer service I have ever had at a hotel! Denzel and Victoria were absolutely amazing. The kindest people who helped us with two rooms when we had a bad experience at another hotel in Manhattan. The hotel is trendy with all amenities. The staff are great. The rooms are spacious. And they even threw in a free bottle of wine! Well done Innside! You have simply amazing employees!

title: Impressive
text:
I would rate this 5 star for location and service.
Personel were just fantastic. Shout out to DENZEL. Helping with anything and everything. Also CHRISTINA. These guys are just amazing and hands on... better than any 5 star service around. They had solutions to literally everything even outside  their Jobs were willing to help.

title: What a fantastic place to stay in New York!
text:
As a solo traveler, I reviewed various hotels for my stay in New York.
Thank goodness I chose INNSIDE by Meliá Nomad.

It is such a great place to stay. So close to everything, walking distance to Times Square and the most sort after Theatres as an example.

After a harrowing cruise experience, the owner Mauricio welcomed me to INNSIDE by way of snacks and a lovely room. I was so very grateful for his consideration.

The front desk staff were all welcoming...so helpful, nothing was too much trouble, especially maps and directions and just great smiles.

I would like to thank Denzel, Paola, Leslie, Jason and Jestin for their help and welcome concern. I was going to walk at 4am to a meeting place some distance away from the hotel to meet a day tour. Leslie suggested to take a cab which I did. As a single woman her suggestion was completely valid.

The meals at The Wilson restaurant, attached to the hotel were great. Once again, friendly service and not expensive. 

So, if any one wants to feel 'at home' in New York, this is exactly the place to stay.

Thanks to everyone...especially Mauricio for the great welcome and all the staff for their great service and smiles.

title: Super friendly and accommodating staff
text: My mom had the safest and friendliest experience at this hotel! She's ESL and a very anxious traveler (traveling alone in her 70s makes the anxiety quite understandable), but Denzel deserves a raise and then some for how kind he's been to my mother. She wanted to change rooms because of a superstition with her previous room number, and Denzel was so pleasant, friendly, and helpful in accommodating her. Denzel's customer service alone will definitely have me recommending this hotel as the place to stay for all of my out-of-town friends and family! Thank you so much for such a positive and friendly experience! (And give Denzel a raise!!)

title: One of my best NYC hotel experiences (and  I’ve been staying in NYC hotels since 2016)
text: The location is great and the staff were so friendly when I arrived! After traveling for 10 hours to get here, Denzel was so pleasant and explained everything so clearly to me. Talking with him made me forget how exhausted I was from my travels, and he was super accommodating when I asked to switch rooms because of superstition. 10/10 experience!

title: A relaxing stay in the centre of manhattan.
text: We loved staying at this hotel. The staff were all so helpful and friendly. Christina and Leslie at the front desk helped us so much, nothing was to much trouble. The bar and restaurant were great too with delicious food and excellent drinks, a little oasis in the centre of the city. We'd definitely come again.

title: Nice place
text:
Nice hotel with excellent service in a convenient location. Will definitely recommend for future friends and family. 

Modern bar and well appointed rooms. Had everything I needed for my stay. 

Thanks to the staff for making this a seamless stay.

title: Best hotel ever
text: I’m from Brazil and had a very good experience with the hotel. The staff team is amazing, Denzel, Victoria, Jason, Kevin and Jestin, all amazing people. They helped me with packages and everything. The food is great, breakfast is ordered so is good to have at least 20 minutes to order and eat. Thanks everyone for the reception

title: Pesimo, carísimo y muy mal servicio.
text:
Fué my Caro, con mal servicio, habitaciones pequeñas, no cambian las sabanas, ruidoso habitaciones sin vistas,
Desayuno mediocre con muy mal servicio.
Impensable para un hotel del grupo melia
No volveré.

title: Un hotel sin categoría
text:
Precio excesivo 800 dólares la habitación diaria para un hotel con los pasillos sucios
Estuve una semana y no me cambiaron las sábanas
Pedí una habitación mayor, incluso pagando más y con malos modos no nos hicieron ni caso 
La habitación daba a un patio interior con poca luz
Solo una silla en la habitación y un baño que es del tamaño de un aseo
He venido muchas veces a Nueva York y siempre estuve en hoteles muchísimo mejores
Elegí Melia por ser español creyendo que sería un buen hotel, no tiene ni un salón donde estar, y del gimnasio mejor no hablar sucio y con 4 máquinas
El desayuno en un bar concertado con el hotel pues no tiene ni bar, sucio,frío y muy incómodo.
No se lo recomiendo a nadie

title: Ideaal hip hotel om NY te verkennen met kids
text:
Perfect gelegen. Centraal om NY te bezoeken, dicht bij metro station. Gemakkelijk dat je er ook kan eten. Ze hebben kindermenu. Ontbijt hebben wij genomen bij de pain quotidien om de hoek. De inrichting van het hotel en de kamer is top. De aangename geur en de algemene sfeer in het hotel zijn super. 
De kamer was netjes, ruim, we hadden een mooi uitzicht .
De badkamer was precies gloednieuw. Douche werkte perfect . Er is totaal geen geluidshinder. Er zijn 4 liften en ze werken uitstekend. Vriendelijke ontvangst aan de balie.
Zouden zeker hier terug komen.

title: New find
text: Location, staff, decor all lovely. Nice food nearby. Shout out to Denzel, Justin, Paola, and Jason. I am in NYC too often but would go back for sure. Being here during UNGA and climate week meant everything was sold out. Glad I tried something new.

title: What a gem!
text: This hotel did not disappoint! Came up for a little fun NYC getaway and our hotel was like heaven. The room was awesome - spacious, clean and the most comfortable bed ever. The room was equipped with a coffee machine and had complimentary water and sparkling beverages. It's clear that they host a lot of group trips here as there were several large groups of tourists. The location was perfect for us and it's close to the subway so you can get to anywhere you need to go! The cute little photo op in the lobby was fun.

title: Chic Hotel with Great Service
text: The staff were absolutely excellent, treated us with courtesy and were quick to resolve any problems we had. The room was chic and clean, and the breakfast was really good. A great vibe and environment. Only critiques would be that our first room smelled of smoke so we had to move, the coffee machine wasn’t clean, and the bed wasn’t firm enough for my husband. But for me the service made up for all of that. Shoutout to Jonathan who checked us in and took great care of us, and Jestin who called to make sure we were happy after our room change. Thanks you guys!

title: Gerne wiederholen
text: Es war rundum sehr gut, allein an 2 Tagen unseres Aufenthalts (insgesamt 8 Nächte) gab es beim Frühstück einige Dinge wie O-Saft, warme Milch), was es an den anderen Tagen gab, nicht.Am Wochenende war das Frühstücks-Personal offensichtlich überfordert - obwohl alle sehr tüchtig waren. Insgesamt war das gesamte Personal frisch, freundlich, hilfsbereit.

title: Amando la experiencia
text:
Amando las noches de flamenco de Cataleya Rooftop bar , la atención de Angelo Zuluaga fue lo mejor de la noche , sus recomendaciones en tragos , siempre al pendiente de nosotros , su sonrisa y amabilidad nos dejó con ganas de volver, los chicos son tan cálidos como la música, el lugar es muy ameno para conversar y disfrutar de buena música.

Me encanto y definitivamente volvería.

title: Great location
text:
A very nice hotel in an excellent location. 
Rooms are small but have all you need. 
A couple of small issues with cups not being cleaned and teabags replaced by overall a good stay. 
Right in the middle of town so easy enough to get uptown and down. 
Staff were very good.

title: Best bed ever
text: The hotel is nice and modern with some very nice staff, though the city view is debatable as we looked across at another building and was on the 14th floor.  The best part for me was the lovely comfy bed and Pillows.  I didn't want to leave.  The downside is the $35 per night plus tax you have to pay.  All in all though a lovely hotel

title: Lovely team
text: The hotel is well located and easy access by public transport, the rooms are spacious and the staff is lovely. the hotel is modern and perfect for couples. The bed is comfy and the room is spacious with a good size open wardrobe.

title: Il mio primo viaggio a NYC
text: Megalopoli da visitare, ancor più se ospitati da una struttura ricettiva, gestita da giovani cordiali e sempre predisposti a renderti il soggiorno indimenticabile. Avendo due figlie adolescenti non è semplice coinvolgerle, ma grazie ai loro consigli il viaggio è stato più coinvolgente per tutti.

title: Buen hotel en Chelsea
text: Hotel agradable, cómodo y muy bien ubicado. Era la segunda vez que me alojaba y lo elegiré en las próximas estancias en Nueva York. Buen restaurante con dj por las tardes. Ambiente muy agradable. Lo recomiendo.

title: One night
text: Room had all amenities, plus an espresso, water and juices. Good internet connection. Staff were kind and professional, check-in and check-out was smooth. Walking distance to Penn Station, shopping and restaurants.

title: Girls weekend
text: The location and terrace of this hotel was fantastic! The room and bathroom are very small. The vent is a few feet above the bed making it uncomfortable to sleep and would drip on you sometimes. The bathroom is also very small.

title: Semana en new york
text:
Todo genial, gran situación a sólo 15 minutos de Times Square y cerca de un supermercado.
Gran personaltabto en recepción  como en limpieza y mantenimiento, las camas muy cómodas y se ha podido dormir de lujo, totalmente recomendable

title: Definitely returning! My new go-to:)
text: 6 day stay here for my mother and father visiting NYC from Japan. Pretty hotel, super clean, nice views, great locations (good restaurants all around) And most especially amazing staff. Big thank you to Paola and Jonathan! (and all other front desk staff- sorry I didn't get everyone's names but they were all lovely) Everyone was absolutely incredible, super welcoming and warm, helpful. I really appreciated everyones attentiveness. Visiting a big city can be overwhelming or not the warmest experience sometimes so I really wanted my parents to have a good time. I am so glad I had they stay here, they felt super comfortable, safe and had the best time.  Thank you!

title: Innside by Meliá NY Nomad. Home away from home. You will just love it.
text: Well, here I am once again, writing a review, after so many years of going to this hidden jewel in Manhattan: Innside by Meliá New York Nomad, in Chelsea, NYC. One more time, I want to say that I love this hotel. It is home away from home! This is the way how we are received there. This Meliá is always evolving for good, the rooms, amenities, and much more. The extraordinary team is committed to deliver the very best. I want to mention breakfast; is very good. I truly recommend it if it is within your budget. Prices of the rooms are reasonable and of course one has to check from time to time if they change or if it is peak season, etc. Reserving through the webpage of the hotel is highly recommended. The hotel is located in a very strategic place where one can go walking anywhere. There is very good public transportation in NYC. The Meatpacking District is only a few blocks away from the hotel. I love walking to that area where the High Line is & Hudson Yards. Most importantly is to mention the people who make this hotel so special: the staff, mangers and general manager. They are professional and very attentive. In my case, as a Meliá member, they try to offer me the very best within the possibilities and as some of them know us already, they know what are our preferences. We have celebrated there birthdays, anniversaries and much more. There is always a wonderful surprise waiting for us. Even if you are not a Meliá member and you let them know what you need, they will go out of their way to make you feel special and happy. I have to thank once again all the people who work there and make this place so unique. Last year we were there when the Queen of Spain stayed for a few days and everything was well organized and peaceful. It was the week of United Nations. Manhattan is packed at that time. I want to give a shout out once again to Mr. Mauricio P. (G M), to Mr. Robert H.(one of the founders if I have to describe how much he means to us), Mr. Alex who is amazing, Ms. Christina who provides excellent customer service, Mr. Justin, who delivers excellency and all the rest of the team. Forgive me for the ones I did not mention but I have a limit to write. The Wilson, the restaurant of the hotel is very good. The food is delicious and drinks are well prepared. Also, the staff is professional and attentive. However, it will be nice to add to the menu some charcuterie as a small bite/appetizer. Thank you for everything to ALL, and we look forward to our next visit. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS MELIA in NYC.

title: Espectacular. Relación calidad precio inmejorables.
text:
Después de mucho buscar un hotel en Nueva York que se ajustara a nuestras necesidades por fin nos decantamos por este Meliá y creo que la elección fue más que acertada. El check in rapidísimo ,además nos hicieron upgrade a una habitación más grande que la que teníamos contratada solo por el hecho de ser miembro de Meliá Rewards, un detalle espectacular, porque la habitación estaba en el piso más alto con unas vistas espectaculares.Poder  irse a dormir viendo el Empire State desde la cama es algo impagable. 
La situación del hotel es bastante buena, con la Penn Station a un tiro de piedra y Time Square a unos 20 minutos. 
La atención del personal ha sido inmejorable, mostrándose siempre dispuestos a ayudar.
Un hotel para recomendar y sin duda para repetir.

title: The best boutique hotel in NYC!
text: The second we walked into this hotel, we were greeted by the lovely smiles of Leslie and Gia at front desk! All the staff were very attentive and kind and made sure everything was up to our standards. Thank you for a wonderful stay!

title: Excellent hotel, just love Melia :)
text:
This hotel is in a great area of Manhatten. The hotel is just so close from everything you want to see in NYC. The staff is just so welcoming as we expect that from the Melia family. 
Special comment to Jonathan who really took the time to confirm my reservation (which was done trought Melia International). Akhlima Ullah, Director of front desk is just great. She is the one that took care of the check in and the check out. What a nice person, she is just so professianal with a beautifull personality. The staff at the restaurant was also very nice. Everybody works for the client. I cannot wait to go back in December. 
Only one little note, they should try to have 2 frying station to assure that people with shell seafood  intolerance be able to have more choice in the restaurant menu.
Great work :)

title: Melia Innside nomad
text: Muy satisfecho con la ubicación del hotel, el.sercicio y la limpieza. Agua gratis todos los días. Deben de mejorar la conexión WiFi. El servicio de desayuno, a pesar de no ser desayuno continental tenía una carta variada (dulce y salado), a tener en cuenta que el restaurante no es de Melia.

title: Amazing experience
text:
I would recommend this hotel to family and friends.
The vibe with the live DJ in the evening set up a fun and inviting experience. 
The location was central for the sightseeing. 
The rooms were clean and modern. 
Absolutely amazing!

title: Another excellent stay at a Melia property
text:
This was my first time back to NYC post-pandemic and I couldn't have chosen a better accommodation than INNSiDE by Melia. 

Location wise, it was super convenient with easy accessibility to transit and lots of food options. If you love smoothie bowls like me, it's less than a 2-mins walk to Playa Bowls (would definitely recommend checking them out). 

The hotel is very clean and room was relatively spacious. Robes were made available and they have the cutest slippers. 

What I feel sets this hotel above the rest was its staff. We were greeted by Denzel, who made us feel at home right away. He was extremely helpful and made check in a breeze. I also want to shout-out Leslie, David, Paola, Gia and John, who also assisted with a smooth check in. We were there for July long weekend and there was a lot of rain. After getting caught in the rain one night, Mo was super helpful with bringing us a kettle to make tea and extra blankets (thank you Mo!). Check out was just as smooth as check-in thanks to Christine and Destiny. 

My experience here was so positive, I will definitely come back. The staff is amazing, a family away from home. 

Thank you INNSiDE, for making out trip to NYC amazing!

title: Great hotel with unnecessary fee
text: The Innside NOMAD is a great hotel with all the little things you need when visiting a city like NY. Unfortunately the 45$/night resort fee left a bitter taste in my mouth. Location, staff and extras are really great, so book your stay but include the fee in the prize when comparing.

title: Great hotel
text: Friendly and helpful staff, lovely hotel in a good location. From the minute we arrived staff could not have been more accommodating. Hotel was clean and tidy and although bar downstairs did not impact our sleep as could not hear from our room. Hotel is really well located for many of the main tourist spots.

title: Our new fave place to stay in NYC
text: Great location and wonderful staff...Jonathan was so friendly, helpful, gave a great dinner recommendation.  He told us if we didn't like it, he would treat us to breakfast!  We came back with glowing reviews and he gave us coupons for on site breakfast for the next day anyway! We found services to be very good and several things were included such as bottles of water for the asking. The room was quiet, the bed very comfortable.  Great access to 6th ave and 7th ave so getting around by subway was a breeze.

title: Insuperable
text:
Un hotel perfecto para un viaje a NYC. Por un lado destacar la ubicación: en pleno Manhattan pero lejos del bullicio de algunas calles que en ocasiones se vuelven intensas. Por otro lado confirmar lo que ya había leído con respecto al personal: te resuelven dudas y te solucionan problemas en el momento. En recepción todo el personal es muy agradable y tiene mucha disposición. Mencionar de forma especial a Jestin y a Leslie que fueron muy resolutivos y encantadores con nosotros. Los desayunos también especiales, el personal de “The Wilson” nos ha dejado sin palabras: Michael e Isaac son tremendamente cariñosos, preocupados siempre de que no nos faltara de nada, incluso nos recomendaron varios sitios para visitar en la ciudad. El resto de camareros maravillosos, amables, atentos y con una sonrisa siempre en la cara. Algunos hablan español y otros no, pero todos ponen de su parte por hacer de tu desayuno un ratito muy muy agradable. Recomendable el desayuno 100%.
La limpieza del hotel estupenda y la tranquilidad del mismo también (para nosotros descansar y dormir tranquilos es fundamental y aquí lo hemos conseguido). La habitación muy práctica (con secador, plancha, caja fuerte…)y con unas vistas espectaculares. Repetiríamos sin dudarlo un segundo. Te reponen agua diariamente así como unas sodas muy gustosas para cuando llegas agotado de hacer turismo. Un hotel que sin duda contribuye enormemente a que tu viaje a NYC sea top.

title: Great Value, Location, Family Suite Better than Expected
text: We stayed in the family suite and online I was not clear there were two bathrooms, which there were which is nice.  It's basically two adjoining rooms which is perfect.  The location was great, staff great, vibe great, room clean and had what you need.  I left a message for the manager re; an issue during booking and did not hear back, that was the only thing I can say that did not exceed expectations.

title: Definitely recommend!
text: I cancelled another hotel at last minute due to bad reviews, and am so happy that I booked this one instead! I was here for a week and the staff were helpful, the location amazing, the rooms clean and  food was great in the restaurant. Highly recommend! Thank you to everyone there!

title: Charming but overpriced in Chelsea
text: Inviting facade and lushly planted outdoor patio makes a great first impression, as does the particularly friendly front desk staff, who greeted me upon check-in with complimentary water and half bottle of wine.  The room I considered adequately sized by NYC standards, but asethetically the room needed better attention to trim and condition, with more marks on the walls and doors than I expect for a hotel in this price range.  Cleanliness was adequate but underwhelming for the price.  The in-room frig with complimentary water and soda was a nice touch, but this merely takes some of the sting out of the $40/day daily resort fee added on to the bill.  One of the most critical features, the bed, was surprisingly poor quality, squeaky, cheap frame, cheap unsupportive mattress, poor quality pillows, noisy.  I have recently stayed in a 2.5 star chain hotel with a far superior mattress, for example.  Poor bed quality translated to so-so sleep which is a dealbreaker for any hotel stay.  The TV had a surrounding frame with HDMI and USB ports to connect, for instance, a streaming device I brought, but the port did not work, a minor disappointment.  While the hotel excels at small touches to provide a charming personal touch, it fails in the most fundamental services  a guest needs for an enjoyable stay.  Ultimately I would not stay there again next time I visit NYC.

title: Gran Hotel
text: Hotel bien ubicado, cómodo y en muy buen estado. La habitación familiar para cuatro personas no es muy grande, pero siendo ordenado no hay problema. El personal muy atento. Casi todos hablan español. Quisiera destacar la atención ofrecida por LESLIE., Un encanto como persona y una EXCELENTE profesional!! Gracias por todo Leslie!!

title: Excellent customer service
text: I now know why this hotel is always sold out - the service here is beyond 5-star. This visit was our second stay at the facility, and when we saw Denzel, John behind the reception desk, we knew exactly what to expect. We had just endured a 5-hour drive to get to NY, and the last thing we needed, was a place that did not have their customer service sorted. This place checks all the boxes of excellence; fantastic staff, great food at the Wilson, the rooms are clean, modern and spacious. The vibe is 100%.

title: Best Gem in NYC
text: Overall, the entire staff was friendly and very welcoming.  They made sure my family was comfortable even when they were busy.  My sister left her wallet in the room.  Staff found it and fedexed it to her home.  Hotel is chic and has a nice vibe.  Very comfortable I door and outdoor space, large and spacious.  Walking distance to tourists sites, subway, rental bikes and restaurants.  Safe part of town and Uber/Lyft friendly.  $100 ride from Kennedy airport.

title: Good experience - great customer service - Leslie
text:
Kudos to Leslie at the reception  as she helped us with our multiple bookings being extremely effficient.

We had a small issue with the a/c but was fixed immediately 

Hotel is really nice, clean and modern.

title: Worked well for a family with 2 kids
text:
We had a great stay at the INNSide by Melià NOMAD. Denzel made us feel very welcome at checkin and gave us all the essential information about the hotel. 

The room was tight, but well-sized for NYC standards. We had enough room for us and our 8 & 10 year old kids. Beds were comfortable, water pressure was good and the AC worked well. Checked all of our boxes.

title: Great
text: Good experience! Clean room, great service, and comfortable bed! Hope the hotel could provide the kettle for boiling the water will be better! Happy that your service provide the beverage and water for all day.

title: Muy satisfecha
text: Fui con mi esposo y la verdad me sentí muy satisfecha con el servicio,la carta de desayunos es variada,la limpieza y amabilidad del personal fue excelente y están muy atentos de que el cliente se sienta cómodo y feliz

title: Excellent customer service/ Beautiful comfy hotel in very good location
text: I stay in this hotel often and I always feel like at home. Rooms are spacious, clean and with good amenities. Customer service is excellent. Jestin, Paola, Gia, Leslie at the front desk are super friendly and very professional. I’m very happy with all my stays. I recommend this hotel 100%

title: Front desk staff "Awesome"
text: I stopped in yesterday to add some extra amenities to my reservation.  I met Mr. Denzel Hamilton and the staff at the front check-in desk.  Mr. Hamilton honored my request with ease.  He was well-groomed, friendly, knowledgeable, and professional!  It was truly a pleasure visiting the INNSIDE New York Nomad.  Mr. Hamilton and the staff.  They are a must-have!  All the best and I can't wait until my next reservation....... Cheers!

title: Muy buena, instalación es perfectas, trato espectacular
text: Muy buena, instalación es perfectas, trato espectacular, los recepcionistas muy competentes y amables, trato exquisito. Viajamos con niñas y todo el personal muy amable.  Estuvimos muy cómodos y el sitio muy agradable.

title: The Innside by Melia New York Nomad—-Experience true wraparound SERVICE
text: I have stayed at many boutique hotels with ambiance and tremendous service…. This past week at the Innside surpassed most!  Both Leslie and Christine from the front desk were stellar and so very helpful in so.vying problems that naturally occur…. They went way beyond and I truly appreciated their sincerity and solutions…. Cannot wait to retuen

title: Exceptional value for the price!
text: I had a great stay. The staff was friendly and had a lot of recommendations. Jestin, Denzel, Gia and Alex were all attentive. The room is comfortable and great view from all floor. City vibe. I highly recommended staying here.

title: AMAZING STAFF!!!!
text: I stayed at Innside for 2 nights and I loved it! Mainly because of the staff.  Particularly, Denzel, Gia and Alez and Jestine.. Any  questions or concerns I had they obliged. They’re personalities were intoxicating. They always gave recommendations and made my stay relaxed and safe. I will be coming back because of them!  😊

title: Viaje a NY
text: En general. , todo bien. A destacar la amabilidad y atención de David , que ayudó a la recepcionista ya que ella no sabía español, y David fue genial la ayudó a ella y a nosotros, y los días posteriores nos ayudó en todo y con una amabilidad increíble.gracias por todo.

title: my stay at Melia
text: First of all, I would like to thank the Melia Hotel. The warm welcome that I received from Denzel was second to none. I feel this made my stay 10x better. He has made things very smooth and easy and for that he is very appreciated. Jonathan was also very helpful,  and was very attentive when it came down to all my questions about my stay. Next time i’m in New York, I will definitely be returning to this hotel.

title: Perfecta ubicación
text: Muy buena ubicación para disfrutar de la ciudad. Buen ambiente en las zonas comunes. Las habitaciones están diseñadas para descansar, debido al gran tamaño de las confortables camas. A pesar de ser céntrico el aislamiento acústico es bueno.

title: Appreciation
text:
Best customer service ever both at check in/out and rooms service. Employees were very helpful, jumping to help and finding solutions to my requests.
My family experienced best time in staying at Innside by Melia New York Nomad hotel and will definitely recommend others to come and stay there.
I would especially like to emphasize the following employees:
Destiny, Jestin, Christina, Leslies, Kima.
Thanks to Destiny, we checked in early on 08/06/2023 and she did all her best to give us directions to explore New York. My kids were happy too. And Christina helped us with check out and storing our backpacks at the hotel while we went to see the Empire State Building.

Thank you so much for your hard work.

title: Great place to stay.
text:
What a fun vibe to this hotel. Today is day one but it’s a great start. Check-in was wonderful with Denzel and Victoria. Such a great welcome! 
Now enjoying happy hour at Wilson’s - oysters and Prosecco. I will be definitely make a return visit to INNsIDE on my next trip to New York!

title: If you’re looking for a hotel in NYC, this is it!
text:
From the moment you walk into the lobby, you can feel the warm that the innside hotel offers. From the live DJ, to the outdoor bar and rose garden, this hotel makes you feel right at home.

Greeted by Denzel and Victoria, they made sure my room was promptly and even offered complimentary items to make my stay a very pleasant experience. These are two of the nicest hotel staff members I’ve ever met. 

The bed felt like sleeping on a cloud and the overall upkeep of the hotel is top notch! 

I can not recommend this hotel enough!

title: Excelente
text: Estuvimos es este hotel el pasado julio x una semana y nos encanto es moderno acogedor espacioso con pequeños lugares preciosos el restaurante muy buena comida y un café súper bueno el gerente general súper amable y muy profesional pero lo mejor que nos pasó fue Denzel el muchacho de la recepción es espectacular amable siempre dispuesto a ayudar y a resolver cualquier inquietud la limpieza  súper todo limpio y todos muy serviciales fueron unas vacaciones memorables que siempre guardaremos con mucho cariño y esperemos regresar y encontrarnos con ellos nuevamente graciasssss mil x todo

title: Great atmosphere and positive attitude
text:
We enjoyed our stay here, except the fact that housekeeping didn’t do a good job at first, and making sure the toilet was clean, but other than that it was a great experience since they moved it into another room, and because they give free beverages, which really helps with children. The restaurant could do with a couple more options for easy takeout since after all, this is New York City.
Parking could be enabled in better ways, and perhaps a valet would be worth it. The rooms are quite nice and the toilets are excellent other than if they’re not clean, but I got an apology from the manager of housekeeping and they rectify the issue in a positive manner so I appreciate that.

title: Wonderful stay!
text: A lovely hotel with a modern vibe. Sleek rooms and super comfy beds and pillows! I need to speak very highly of Gia R at the front desk, and Jestin the senior front desk manager. Gia was not only kind and helpful, she went above and beyond assisting me with transiting issues. I wouldn’t have been able to sort them out without her. Jestin is also extremely kind and ensured our stay was truly memorable. They both have hearts of gold! 10/10 experience, would definitely stay here again

title: 5 out of 5, first time back since college
text: After a long and delayed flight from the west coast we were ready to just go to sleep! We were greeted by Jonathan and he was exactly what we needed after that harsh trip. Sweet and kind and made sure that our stay at the hotel would not only be restful but fulfilling. The entire team was incredible throughout our stay, the room was small but perfect for my partner and I. Clean and modern and had everything we needed! We will definitely be back again :) .

title: Leslie and Victoria are great 😊
text:
Leslie and Victoria are amazing, check in was smooth and easy helped us organise another room at ease and they were so helpful and lovely! 

They made our check in process so good that it’s started off our vacation with a bang, if your visiting New York stay here

title: Great Stay!
text:
Front desk staff was amazing and accommodating. Restaurant had delicious food and very good drinks !

Very clean and modern , comfortable and quiet, close to metro . Great views !
Highly recommended 10/10

title: Not a good place to stay
text: Mattress was horrendous- was so soft like something you’d find at a youth hostel. Room was beyond tiny- kind of like a pod and room was not cleaned well, particularly the bathroom. Will most definitely not stay there again.

title: Good place to stay.
text: We had a good stay at INNSiDE Nomad. There are only a few issues I would bring up. The rooms are small and the lighting in the rooms is not good. There was no overhead lighting, the bedside lighting is very dim, and when we first arrived our room did not have an additional lamp. The staff was responsive to bring us an additional lamp. It improve the situation, but the room still did not have a lot of light. The bathroom did not have very much counter space. There is a reasonable amount of drawer space and places to hang clothes. Otherwise, the beds are comfortable and the staff is very helpful. The room was exceptionally quiet.

title: Business trip
text: Very nice hotel with fun spaces and amenities. I enjoyed the flavored drinks in the mini fridge in the room. I wish the check out didn’t take so long. One customer was monopolizing the hotel agent’s time and it went on for several minutes before she called for another to help.

title: Awesome stay
text: Great stay!! Service was off the hook awesome!! This place will be my place to stay everytime I visit NYC. Received an upgrade to my room and made the experience so much nicer. We also had brunch at the Wilson. We had an issue with our reservations due to miscommunication on the restaurant side. However it was addressed. We order two items and they were not available but they gave us free mimosas. Food was good and we even got free bread for our ride back to Boston. Service at the restaurant was great. Although they seem a little under staff by they did an awesome job. Thank you🙌

title: Outstanding
text: Beatiful property. The lobby, restaurant, bar, patio, and rooms are all very nice. Chromecast on room tv’s is awsome. DJ, free hotdogs, and beer in the lobby are unique and fun. Location is great, within walking or subway distance of everthing. Overall great place to stay. 100% Recommend.

title: Change without notice.
text: My room was changed without notice. I booked a double and it was changed to a King. I came with a guest so I needed the double. There is also a price difference. The double is more expensive than the king and my bill has not been adjusted. I do need to mention that the manager on duty, Justin, tried his best to make things right within his power. He's awesome.

title: Quiet rooms
text: We booked a family loft which was basically connected adjoining rooms. The rooms are simple yet well equipped, and honestly the most quiet rooms I have experienced in NYC. The front desk was amazing, always smiling and very helpful. I would stay here again in a NewYork minute

title: NYC
text: Traveled to NYC for the first time since Covid.  Picked InnSiDE by Melia New York Nomad based on other reviews and it did not disappoint.  Hotel location was perfect for our planned activities, walkable to train station, empire station, Chelsea Market and Hudson Yard.  Easy access to the Redline for travel uptown and to Battery Park for Statue of Liberty Cruises.  The hotel staff was excellent, everyone was super friendly, helpful and attentive from the time we arrived to departure (front desk, bar/restaurant/housekeeping). .  We were able to check our bags on early arrival, they texted us when our room was ready (early!) and we were able to store our bags on check out so we could enjoy the city before our late afternoon train departure.  We also had a room on the 19th floor with a city view and no city noise.  Extremely quiet.  Slept great! This was our first experience with INNSide and will definitely stay at their properties again. Highly recommend!

title: Séjour en famille
text:
Très bon hôtel, personnel très accueillant, emplacement idéal (à cinq minutes de l'empire State building  
à dix minutes du flatiron et cinq minutes du Madison square garden) bouche de métro à une rue de l'hôtel

title: Muy recomendable
text:
Muy buena experiencia, fui con mi hija de 17 años y todo bien. Buen servicio, Leslie en recepción excelente, también el chico que nos guardó las maletas después del checkout, antes de irnos al aeropuerto, muy amable. Habitación muy limpia, camas cómodas, sábanas muy blancas al igual que las toallas. 
Estuvimos 6 noches y todo bien. Llegamos antes del horario de ingreso y nos dieron un early check-in sin costo, perfecto, veníamos cansadas del viaje. En general, muy recomendable!

title: Love it here
text:
The best always. Most amazing courteous staff who always have a big warm smile and genuinely enjoy what they do. After my first visit I came back this weekend with my business partner who equally enjoyed it & will be returning this
Upcoming weekend as well. Simply love it it here

title: Staying at Nomad
text: Very good location and staffs are friendly and accomodating.  I just noticed that they did not vacuum our room during our 5 days stay but everything looks good.  No pen or paper to write on just like other hotels.  The hotel has a very pleasant smell as soon as you walk in and they even provide you with water anytime you ask them.  I would recomend and stay here again on my next visit.

title: Excellent hotel
text: This hotel is a great location, friendly staff and very comfortable accomodations. The rooms are beautiful, modern, hardwood floors, clean and staff very friendly and helpful. This is a boutique hotel that is exceptional and would stay here again with my family. It was quiet  and easy to check in and stop with your car to unload your luggage. The elevators are quick, great wifi, fridge in room and a fun experience! Dj in lobby, and cool vibe to this hotel!

title: Great Hotel
text: Myself, my husband and my 10 year old daughter have just come back from a great stay, very easy to check in and the staff were really friendly and helpful, offering us a bottle of water which was appreciated after a long trip from the UK. The rooms were a good size for NY and were well cleaned everyday and the beds were very comfy after all the walking around the city there was also a small refrigerator which was stocked everyday with water and soft drinks. Also a great hairdryer so you wont need to bring one. The location is really good on a quiet street but close enough walk to many attractions, subways, restaurants and we also loved going to Madison Square park which was a 10 mins walk to Shake Shack where you could get a wine and beer in the park watching the world go by and the squirrels and dogs :) I would definitely recommend this hotel to others going to the city.

title: Money is money.
text:
La habitación esta bien, limpia y cómoda aunque pequeña. El baño limpio y bien.
La localización es buena, te puedes mover fácilmente andando y en transporte público. Buena wifi. Gimnasio pequeño, pero suficiente porque nunca hay nadie.
Hay unos zumos que te obligan a pagar con unos sabores muy diferentes a los que estamos acostumbrados por aquí, útiles para refrescarte de las caminatas aunque si diesen la opción de no pagar por ellos, no los elegiría.
Llama la atención que en recepción nadie hable español en un Melía, un cero para la persona encargada de seleccionar al personal.
Tuvimos un problema con el enlace del vuelo, no era culpa del hotel evidentemente, sino de la compañía aérea, pese al avisar al Hotel nos cobraron las 15 noches en lugar de las 14 noches que pasamos. Hubiera sido un detalle cobrarnos las 14 reales pero se ve que detalles no tienen ninguno.
Pero lo mejor ocurrió al irnos, pasas por el mostrador, te dicen que todo está correctamente abonado (noches, tasas, bebidas...) y te encuentras que mientas estás volando de vuelta te han metido 180,26 € sin explicación alguna en la tarjeta. Pese a enviar varios mails al Hotel nadie ha contestado.

title: Denzel and Dirmarys - the dynamic duo!
text: The Innside by Melia provided such a comfortable stay for me after a long day of travel. Denzel and Dirmarys were so welcoming and helpful. They both did an amazing job of allowing me to truly relax during my short stay. I will definitely be back. Thank you both!

title: Exceptional Service in a Prime Location: A Delightful City Stay
text:
A stay at this hotel immerses you in the heart of the city, a stone's throw from the iconic Flatiron Building and a wealth of other landmarks. The superbly facilitated rooms boast an inclusive minibar, a delightful addition that is comfortably covered in the daily maintenance fees.

While the fitness center may leave something to be desired due to its compact size and limited equipment, this shortfall is markedly overshadowed by the hotel's truly outstanding customer service. The dedication and amicability of the hotel staff are unparalleled, with Jestin and Denzel deserving of particular commendation for their exceptional assistance. Their professionalism and warm disposition contributed significantly to a memorable hotel experience. This hotel, highlighted by its extraordinary customer service, is certainly a strong contender for a satisfying stay in the city.

title: One day stay
text:
Stayed over night for birthday. The view from the terrace was wonderful. The bed was lumpy and uncomfortable. The room service was very good. I would recommend it for a romantic weekend stay.
Hopefully your bed will be better.

title: Great hotel for visiting NYC
text: We were very impressed with the hotel. Very clean and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. We loved the decor in the common areas, lots of spaces to relax outside of the room. Our room was Very quiet for sleeping and we were so happy to have the daily breakfast- lots of yummy options.

title: Wrong reservations and dirty rooms
text: Gave me wrong room than couldn’t correct there mistake and also rooms were horribly filthy .. one person tells there correcting there mistake one tells you they can’t do anything about it .. overall bad experience

title: First time in New york
text: This hotel did not disappoint the staff was really friendly and the location great. The atmosphere was amazing I would definitely stay here again. The rooms were nice and clean And the fact that they Replaced Complimentary water in the mini fridge was really convenient.

title: très satristafaite, je recommande cet hotel
text:
personnel très accueillant, chambres avec literie moderne, propres et ménage tous les jours.
possibilité de se faire livrer de la nourriture et la consommer sur la terrasse de l'hotel.
situation centrale proche du métro, des lieux de spectacles, de certains lieux à visiter, et de toutes les commodités (magasins, fast food, spécialités culinaires).

title: Best Customer Service
text: I worked with Destiny for over an hour. The big bus was not confirmed. Called everyone on my paperwork. Emailed my AAA representative for me. No luck! Josh helped me sent our nyc photos to my sister because air drop does not work. My confirmation for our Carey limo had to be printed from my sister’s phone so we could have a copy! My new best friend Destiny made our trip. Transportation was a nightmare to get to Newark and to the hotel. We were so late upon arrival in the NYC area we missed the tour. Christine sold us another ticket today but too far for handicap me to walk to any attraction. I will recommend the family room.

title: Experience
text: Its awesome in this hotel. I am satisfied with their services and its a clean hotel. Also its inside manhattan. You can access all the fun. Me and my family enjoyed so much! The receptionist is very accomodating.

title: Outstanding job!
text: Outstanding property, even better service!  Denzel, Christina, Hector, and Justin were all outstanding, but Denzel, in particular, went over and above to make my wife's birthday celebration a great one!  We were checked in quickly (even though the lobby was packed with people both coming and going...it was raining pretty hard so everyone was packed inside and it was a bit chaotic), the rooms were super clean, and everyone was VERY pleasant (despite the surrounding chaos).  Christina and Justin were a huge help as our daughter left some items behind in the hotel safe and they  did a great job of following up to ensure the items got back to us safely.  Highly recommend this property and will most certainly be staying here both for business and leisure!  Thanks again for a memorable stay!

title: Great experience
text: Ladies at the desk were awesome everyone of them.  Location was perfect for our first visit to New York City. They helped us with subway to Yankee Stadium and it was easy. Rooms were clean and bed was comfortable. Thank you for everything. We loved our stay.

title: I can't wait to book another visit -outstanding staff and customer service
text: This establishment has done their homework on what hospitality looks like in person. The staff is  extremely tuned into their guests. The Rose Garden is beautiful.  The lobby is comfy and chic.  The Wilson restaurant has outstanding food service and the staff is simply amazing! Thank you for an incredible stay.

title: Central location but not extraordinary
text:
Very walkable to many attractions or a subway station. Drinks at The Wilson were well-crafted. Room was clean. The following things prevented me from giving a 5 out of 5, which are things we expect from a property like Meliá:
1) Gym A/C wasn’t functioning so it was hit a humid. Only one strength machine.
2) Grime and noticeable use in the tile in the bathroom.
3) No hair conditioner.
4) Decaf coffee was overstocked while we had to keep asking for more regular.

title: Amazing location amazing non alcoholic mini bar
text: Amazing location amazing room but misunderstanding lead to a bit of frustration during check in..bike rental was awesome..wish the happy hour was longer..all the staff is awesome with an exception of one person

title: Recommend  ten times
text:
I stayed at this hotel for about a week, four times. At first, my company's dedicated travel agency made the reservations for me, but later on, I made the bookings myself for personal trips. I have visited New York more than ten times, and I will continue to stay at this hotel in the future. The advantage of this hotel is that the staff is veary friendly. Everyone tries to help me and solve any problems I have. Especially the manager, Akhlima, and the staff member, Christina, make me want to stay at this hotel just by meeting them. I visited the hotel for the first time this summer since last fall, and they recognized me at a glance. The closeness with the staff unexpectedly makes the trip enjoyable. Of course, all the staff members made an effort to assist me (really!), and I felt their dedication to resolving any requests. I want to express my gratitude through this comment.

Let me share a practical story. The hotel is clean, and the bedding condition is really excellent. I recommend having breakfast here instead of going out to eat (depending on your plan). The sodas in the fridge are also really tasty. I tried to find a similar taste outside but couldn't. The only downside is that it can be a bit noisy in the early morning. The garbage truck dumps on 27th Street, and it was a bit loud. However, this is a common issue with all hotels in New York City. They lend bicycles in the lobby (it might be a bit risky if you're not familiar with New York roads), so I recommend trying it instead of renting a Citi Bike.  Anyway, I will visit here again. I usually don't write reviews or comments (cause it's very labor intense), but I wanted to write one for this hotel.

title: Excelente experiência. Completa.
text: Hotel muito bem localizado, estiloso, com um ótimo restaurante e quarto confortável. Mas o diferencial fica por conta do staff. Todo mundo sempre muito atencioso, com disposição para responder às questões, dar dicas e etc. Um agradecimento especial ao pessoal do balcão no dia 28/05/2023 a tarde. Recomendo sempre a bandeira Meliá.

title: Formidable. Agradable sorpresa.
text:
Mucho mejor de lo que esperaba. He viajado de luna de miel y a la recepción, Dynaris, una recepcionista desde la que desde aquí mando un enorme abrazo, nos atendió perfectamente y en español, que no estaba obligada pera lo hizo por lo que se lo agradecemos enormemente.

Preguntándonos de dónde éramos le dijimos que de España y que era nuestra primera vez en EEUU y nuestro motivo de viaje (Luna de Miel). Al escuchar esto inmediatamente nos dijo que esperásemos un momento y volvió con una botella de vino de cortesía de la casa, magnifico detalle y magnífica educación.

Con respecto al hotel, los ascensores funcionaban a la perfección y muy rápido, la limpieza era brutal. Como anécdota una vez volvimos más pronto por la mañana a  dejar compras en el hotel y reciéntenme había salido el profesional de limpieza, y nos sorprendió que habían limpiado incluso con lejía todo el suelo. Fascinante. Ahora mismo me encuentro en otro hotel en Miami y por respeto a Meliá no pondré nombre, pero la limpieza es una basura ya que solo hacen la cama y se van (hoy lo he comprobado).

Habitación no pudo ser la que esperábamos por motivos que nos explicaron y que son más que comprensibles (cancelaciones de vuelos de huéspedes por el tema de la climatología que hemos vivido desde Canadá). Es comprensible y nada se puede hacer.

El personal del restaurante agradable. A nuestro parecer, al ser españoles nos pareció un poco (bastante) caro pero como dicen en mi pueblo… “es lo que hay”.

La localización no puede ser mejor, boca de metro a 3 minutos, Madison Square Garden a 7 minutos, TimeSquare a 8 minutos andando… y un largo etc.

Si volviese a Nueva York, muy posiblemente volvería sin dudarlo.

Felicidades INNSiDE NoMad by Melia.

title: Ok just for sleeping
text:
Basic Hotel if you just want to sleep. The bar is very nice and the employees are really helpful and friendly. The hotel is well located but without lux.
There is a gym very little but enough if you want to do some exercise. 
I would not repeat it: too noisy

title: Familly Vacation
text:
Good property with very friendly staff through the Hotel (frontdesk, housekeeping, restaurant)
Location is great, but please be aware that the area is full of homeless people which some of them at night start yelling nonsense to people walking around. (if this is an issue for you book another hotel maybe in the hudson yards, tribeca area)
You get a good value in return to the rate

title: Why were we charged a 100 dollar deposit ?
text:
We stayed at  the Meliá between the 14 & 18 of June. On arrival we were told we had to pay a 35 dollar per night resort fee. Fair enough - it’s mentioned in the Meliá app (I am a Meliá rewards customer) we were then asked to pay a further 100 dollar “deposit” for the room that we were told would be refunded when we left. I was a bit surprised but paid the 260dollars asked for. On the second night we were advised that due to a computer glitch our 260 dollar payment had been cancelled and could I pay again ? I was told the original 100 dollar deposit and 35 per night fee would be refunded within 5 working days.
Densel on reception attempted to take over 1000 dollars  - not the 260 dollars he said he was taking. 
The payment was declined however Densel told me the 260 had been successfully taken ???? When I saw the declined payment the next day I visited reception again. Christina was very apologetic and advised I did not need to pay the 207 dollars again and that the full 207 I had already paid would be refunded within 5 working days, as a goodwill gesture for our inconvenience. It is now the 3 of July I still don’t have my money back, I have sent 3 emails and have had no response ? Please respond, I love Meliá hotels but this experience has left me very disappointed.

title: Nice Hotel
text: Overall, this was a nice place to stay. Close to subways and within walking distance to restaurants. I felt very safe here. Staff was helpful. Though it was nice to have a restaurant on site, service and food were just okay.

title: Perfect for families
text:
We were looking for a suite in the Chelsea area, so that the teens and the adults could have separate, but connected, spaces. The INNSiDE was perfect, in set-up and location. Just a few blocks from the 1 line, or the R/W, which went everywhere we wanted to go. The room was cleaned every day, and the staff was never anything less than happy and helpful. 

My only complaints are minor. I wish hotels would use fitted sheets; I know INNSiDE is not the only one to skip this, but at this level I really lamented have the sheet move every night. And the towels are fine--but again, with everything else at the hotel so top-notch, I want some of those fluffy cloud pillows after I shower. 

Those are minor, though. It's a great hotel, and I've already recommended it to several friends.

title: Perfect week
text:
Hello l was in this amazing hotel for fancyfoodshow l never imagine that American air cancel my flight to Miami so this morning l did check out. I can not find hotel and other flight . Thanks  Dirmarys the receptionist she helped so much is a professional 
 Thanks Melia 😍

title: We will stay here every time we visit NY.
text:
This hotel is a class act. From checking in to checking out everything was well organized and accommodating. We were able to check in 3 hours early. We really enjoyed the onsite restaurant, bar, and outdoor seating area. 
The hotel is walking distance to many restaurants and stores.

title: Three nights in New York
text:
Stayed at the Melia New York after it being recommended by relative. 
The location of the hotel is great plenty of bars and restaurants nearby. 
The hotel is clean and the staff friendly and helpful. 
We had a balcony room on the 18th floor, room was small but sitting on the balcony in the morning or evening was worth the extra money.

title: Innside Melia Best place to stay in NYC
text: The Innside by Melia, in NOMAD, is just The best place to stay in NYC. We spend  The PRIDE week-end there and enjoy The friedly atmosphere of The Hôtel and great crowd. The room was full of sunlight with a great view of The finançai district/ Manhattan. After The week-end, when we were at Laguardia, our flight got canceled. We felt lost and tired, we went back to The Hotel which was all booked. The manager Jonathan didn’t leave us  alone and spend a long moment with us until we find a room in an other hôtel at 10Pm. The day after we came back to The hotel to spend 2 more nights with some advantages, always waiting for a new flight. We have been, Many Times to The Innside Melia, now I can say that I appreciate more and more the Hotel for the quality of services, beautiful and very clean rooms, great Innside an outside spaces as restaurant and longues, faboulous location, very close to The empire state building, 5th avenue flagship stores and Macy’s, the Edge and Summit no.1 Vanderbilt and all sort of restaurants. As usual, I will be back for Christmas when NYC is a great party.. Go to the Innside Melia Nomad, it’s permanently changing and getting better.

title: Amazing staff
text: Dirmams, and Jonathan are the best, very friendly, helpful, and generous, when my flight cancelled they helped my with reservation and made everything easy and doable, never seen lovely people like them, keep offering me many options and they were very supportive. I loved this place through them

title: LOVED our stay! 10/10
text: Loved this hotel for a bachelorette trip. Location was perfect, hotel was clean, cute, designed nicely with great vibes. Christina was a DREAM before and during our stay. Leslie and Kima at the front were also WONDERFUL and David with the bags was super lovely. In-room service was also amazing with complimentary beverages. Beds were super comfy too ;) Will absolutely be staying here again.

title: An Unforgettable Stay in the Heart of New York City
text: I recently stayed at Innside Nomad New York and was blown away by the hotel's prime location, hip ambiance, and exceptional service. It is situated in the trendy Nomad neighborhood and offers easy access to iconic attractions. It is an absolute gem that effortlessly blends a prime location, a hip and vibrant ambiance, and impeccable service. Whether you're visiting New York City for business or pleasure, this hotel is the perfect choice. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a stylish stay in the city's heart.

title: Superior customer service in great location
text:
The front desk staff was very helpful in making our stay great. Denzel was pleasant from the time we met him and gave us wonderful tips on things to do and how to maneuver the travel to Broadway . The other great staffers were Jestin, Destini and Diemarys. They made us feel ritght at home.
Room for improvement:
We ate breakfast at the hotel resturuaunt The Wilson, they had a  very limited menu and they never had any decaf coffee for us.
Poor lighting in the rooms.

title: Manhattan / Chelsea comfort
text: Wonderful experience! INNSiDE has a great mix of openness and sophistication. Desk managers Jestin and Denzel were very helpful with last minute booking needs.  The hotel is always comfortable and welcoming to us!

title: Denzel's the best
text: My 10 year old son and I stayed at the INNSide for one night and loved it. Denzel went above and beyond at the front desk. My son's new sweatshirt had shed all over his t-shirt, and Denzel created a make-shift lint roller with a big tape roll to clean it up. So, so nice. Cute rooms, great decor, and walking distance to a lot of fun areas in Chelsea and Nomad. My only complaint is that some of the side streets around the hotel felt a little unsafe, so we had to be mindful and careful at night.

title: Perfect NYC weekend getaway!
text: The service at the Innside New York NoMad was amazing. The staff, Denzel and Liz, were beyond accommodating and thoughtful! The beds were comfortable and room was clean. The vibe was perfect for our very quick weekend getaway to NYC. The hotel was close to so many attractions and restaurants. We'd definitely go return!

title: Delightful Hotel
text: I liked everything about this hotel. The location is perfect. The staff is friendly. The rooms are aesthetically  appealing  and clean. There are options for dining. The gym is well equipped and has stunning views of the Manhattan skyline.

title: I highly recommend this hotel- great staff and great location close to everything
text: The staff was wonderful! Denzel went all out for us. I called ahead to let him know what was going on and he took it from there. The other front desk staff, DeMeris was great too. She taught us how to navigate the rail system to get to Harlem. This was a trip for the memory book! Thanks  Denzel and DeMeris!

title: "An Unforgetable Stay at INNSiDE by Meliá New York Nomad"
text:
We had a chance to stay for a night at INNSiDE by Meliá New York Nomad recently. It's the first time for us and it impress us deeply.

The room we stayed in was really comforting and luxerious. The modern decoration, the comfortable bed and great soundproofing made our room a relaxing retreat.

One thing that really standout during our stay was the cleanliness of the hotel. From our room to the public area, we could see that they take hygiene very seriously. The housekeeping does an excellent job.

Leslie, the hotel manager, also played a important part in making our stay enjoyable. She show real care for guest and respond quickly to our needs. Her personal touch make our experience even better.

The facilities of the hotel were great. There's a well-equipped gym and the Wi-Fi is reliable and fast. The lobby also has a lively atmosphere.

Taking into account the excellent service, comfortable rooms and the location, we feel that our stay is a good value for money. The price might not be the cheapest in the city, but the quality of the experience is definitely worth it.

Our stay at INNSiDE by Meliá New York Nomad was a truly five-star experience. The staff, especially Leslie the manager, made our stay memorable. We highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a wonderful experience in New York City.

title: Terrific
text: great experience. people are very proactive and you feel to be at home. the bar is a great idea, and also the merchandising is incredible. I like the Melia experience. the location in the city is perfect to go north and south

title: Nice hotel, worst bed that you will ever try
text: Nice small hotel, modern and on a good location if you want to be close to meat pack district. Rooms are the typical NY rooms that you don't have enough space, but they are good. The worst part is the quality of the bed. It has been the worst bed that I have ever used in a hotel. It's like staying in the coach of someone at college

title: Una buena elección en NYC.
text:
Estuvimos en el mes de noviembre de 2022,y volvimos  ahora,pues es un excelente hotel,muy bien ubicado.
Su personal,comenzando por Ahklima,y todo su staff,Cristina,Hector…..todos,que estuvieron atentos a todos nuestros requerimientos,ya que fuimos por motivos médicos.
Lo mismo el Restaurante Wilson,con esmerada atencion.

title: The service, incredible. The hotel: modern luxury. I’ll definitely be back.
text:
Incredible staff.  From the moment I arrived, every detail was handled perfectly. Check in was super smooth. Denzel and Jonathan noticed I was arriving late and provided quiet room and water as I came in. 

It was my first time at the hotel, and after providing me a quick overview of the neighborhood and the amenities at the hotel, I could genuinely tell they wanted me to have an exceptional stay. I told them “This service will make me want to come back!” Once I made it to the comfortable, clean, and modern room, I took a shower and realized this entire experience was luxury. 

After the trip, I ended up deciding to stay an additional day. The second day, Hector was as the front desk and was equally attentive and kind, and when Jonathan noticed me he came over and shook my hand, saying he was glad to see I could extend my stay. 

NYC hotels often have one or two elements that make them fun, but this hotel had every aspect of making my stay comfortable. An absolute 5-star time in a 5-star city. I can’t wait to return.

title: Trato del personal excelente
text:
Hotel bien ubicado,con terraza a pie de calle muy agradable para desayunar o cenar. 
Pero lo mejor sin duda la atencion del personal....Dirmarys,Jonathan,Leslie, Kima,Christina...cada uno de ellos ponen de su parte para facilitarte la estancia 
Repetiria sin duda

title: Great staff, great location, cool decor
text: Great hotel - small, charming, well run, clean.  Centrally located to walk most anywhere in NY.  Eclectic decor and ample outdoor space to relax and do work.  Wilson restaurant surprisingly good too!  Denzel and Gia at the front desk were super helpful.  Denzel in particular worked out a mistake I'd made in reservation and gave us a better room than I'd expected.  Give that man a bonus ;)

title: Satisfactory. Nothing more.
text:
I am a member of Melia Rewards but not very active. I don't often travel to locations that have Melia properties.

I had a promo code in my account so I used it for a one night stop in NY where I found the rate attractive for a well-reviewed hotel in a good location.

The stay was fine, nothing extra, nothing lacking. However it wasn't clear to me during the booking process that this hotel imposes a $35 'hospitality fee' which more or less wiped out the value of the promo, so I'd have rather stayed with a program where I have additional benefits. In sum, I felt like I paid $35 for internet access.

title: Muy buena opción
text: Súper bien hotel, limpio céntrico con muchos detalles lindos en la habitación y el elevador todo es como lo ves, el personal de la entrada muy muy lindos siempre atentos intentando dar lo mejor. Mi habitación no era muy grande pero cada pedazo de ella se había logrado con mucho detalle, vale la pena

title: Great experience each time I stay!
text: The hotel employees are friendly and welcoming. The rooms are bright, clean and enjoyable to stay in. I was assisted with my stay by a woman named Dirmarys. She was very friendly and helpful in accommodating my needs. Looking forward to rebooking at the Innside Nomad for my future trips to NYC!

title: Such a lovely experience and super comfortable!
text: Upon Arrival we were welcomed by a young man named Jonathan. He was so sweet and courteous. He helped us to arrange out room as well as some information to the surrounding restaurants and the places we should visit. He also called to check on us once we settled in to see if we had any questions and if everything was to our satisfaction which we were so grateful for.

title: Amazing stay at this hotel
text: What a little treasure, buried away in mid town. Our  first trip to NYC, i went with my daughter as a 30th Birthday treat and would absolutely stay here again. Such a great location, central midtown, but quiet. Rooms lovely and clean, beds super comfy, which is important for me. Everything you need for a city break. Staff very helpful, informative and friendly. The hotel itself is modern, bright and clean. Restaurant and bar were lovely although only ate here once, they had live music some evenings too. As all hotels you pay a extra fee for each night, but this then included, free bike hire, WiFi as much water,  flavoured water and nepresso pods, as you needed and anything  else you may have forgotten to pack. Looking forward to our next visit and wouldn't look at staying anywhere else.  Thank you for a perfect stay

title: Great service
text: Outstanding service, staff super friendly and professional. Hector D was very helpful and welcoming. Enjoyed the bar downstairs, live DJ evenings, rooms are clean, the vibe is uplifting and fun. Will be staying at this hotel every time we visit from now on!

title: It was okay, but not great
text: My check-in was pretty unfriendly, to the point that they didn't give me the wifi password, or offer me water (the guy ahead of me took five)...the place was packed, it's kind of trendy, and it wasn't entirely quiet, though no Chelsea hotel is, probably. I think I may have stayed there under some other chain's ownership, not sure. It was a short stay...I can't say that I would come back in a big hurry, but it was okay. Though they should work on their hospitality, especially in the late evening. A tired traveler should be treated a bit better.

title: I won’t stay anywhere else in Chelsea
text: I’ve stayed at this hotel a dozen times for business travel & am consistently pleased with the accommodations. I am always delighted by the front desk staff. I am greeted with warmth and a smile after a long day of travel. Leslie and Dirmarys, thank you both! The rooms are always immaculately clean and I’m a big fan of the hotel slippers. Soft-close hinges on the room doors would be a great addition; the doors slam even when you try not to alert the entire floor that you’ve arrived. These lobby always has a nice vibe, and I enjoyed watching the painter on this trip.

title: Great trip!
text: Excellent hotel stay! Flew in on a red eye flight extremely tired and the front desk was able to get us checked in to a room at 9am. Location was awesome! Almost every subway station within two blocks or a 10min walk to time square. Don't pass up this hotel!

title: Hotel totalmente recomendable
text: Quedé encantado. Las instalaciones increíbles, las vistas impresionantes y lo mejor de todo fue la atención del personal del hotel. Todos muy agradables, especialmente Leslie y Cristina, pero absolutamente todos amables, ayudando en todo y haciendo la estancia mucho más amena, desde el primero hasta el último. Volvería a repetir sin ninguna duda. Gracias por todo!!!

title: BEST STAFF ANYWHERE!
text: Having lived in NYC for years, I knew this hotel from The Wilson Restaurant which is extremely dog friendly (even with its own dog menu which my pup loves!).  However this was my first time staying at the hotel as a guest...and it certainly will not be my last, what an incredible experience!
