text: I had eaten at the Wilson the month before and had the pleasure of interacting with the staff since I needed to check my bag while at the restaurant. That initial encounter I did not stay but that made an impact wherein when I came back in February I knew I needed to stay at this hotel. It was the best experience. I went for my daughter's birthday. We were well taken care of. The food was delicious and the location was optimal. We were able to walk and see all the sites that we had planned on prior to arriving in New York.

title: WERE HOME!
text: Stopped by after a long break and could not have been more surprised. Jon and Jestin at the Front Desk were beyond helpful and fulfilled all our hopes and dreams. Would highly recommend the hotel staff. WILL BE RETURNING!!!

title: Great hotel and service
text: Great hotel, location and vibe. The rooms are modern and I’ve received complementary wine a d water which is nice. Migel C at the front desk was super helpful, informative and kind. I would recommend this hotel for business and for pleasure.

title: Primer viaje en pareja a New York. 🏳️‍🌈
text: Quiero recomendarles este lugar si van a la ciudad de New York, fue el primer viaje de mi novia a USA y fue el mejor hotel que pudimos escoger, cerca de todo, a 2 minutos de una parada de subway, si te gusta caminar en 15 minutos o menos llegas a time square. La habitación puede ser con vista a la ciudad y de noche es mágico. Increíblemente limpio e impecable, bien iluminado y moderno. Tiene un bar y un restaurant con cargo adicional, nunca los probé pero debe ser rico porque todos los días estaba full. Jose el Chico nocturno de la recepción es demasiado amable y helpful.

title: In
text:
Brilliant funky modern style hotel absolutely perfect staff really helpful, lovely comfortable rooms & pillows 😃 
Great location about 20 mins walk from time's Square would highly recommend
And a special thankyou to front staff kima, Christina

title: Excellent
text: My boyfriend and I stayed at Melia Nomad for my birthday and Miguel Candelario made sure it was special and memorable for me. Thank you so much for your professionalism and kindness. We will be back soon to stay at the Melia Nomad Hotel!

title: Innside Nomad NYC AMAZING
text:
Found this property on-line while looking for something smaller and more intimate for a quick trip to the City.

Spotless hotel, lovely restaurant and friendly staff!  The only thing they couldn't do for me was to stop the rain!

Kima and Kit on the front desk were also lovely...

It's a great location and I'll be going back soon!

title: Great Place!
text: Our first time here, and we had a wonderful experience. Very nice atmosphere/vibe. The staff was superior, especially Christina, Kima and Maria (from the Wilson). Top notch customer service, comfortable room.

title: Wonderful NYC Experience
text: My wife and I enjoyed our stay at the INNSiDE by Melia! The staff works hard to ensure your stay is top notch, especially Liz at the front desk. Overall, it is a beautiful hotel, with great amenities, excellent location, and delicious food. We would stay here again without hesitation!

title: A gem of a hotel in NYC.
text: Stayed here while on a work trip with a couple of colleagues.  Staff are friendly & upbeat.  Jestin at reception was delightful, helpful and welcoming.  The rooms are small but perfect for a quick business trip to NYC. Room was clean and comfortable.  Location is central and  the room was nice quiet for a good nights sleep.breakfast was delicious.

title: Great hotel in a fun location
text: I arrived late after a long day of business meetings and I was greeted warmly by Miguel at the front desk.  He was incredibly informative and helpful.  My room was very clean and comfortable and exactly what I needed after a long day. The location was perfect for my meetings, dinner, night life.  Really enjoyed my stay and will definitely book again next time I'm in the city.

title: Best NY lodging in years!
text: What everyone else says about the genuine warmth and sweetness of the staff...1000%! Kudos to HR. The cleanliness and tidiness is clear from the moment you walk in, but even moreso once you enter the room! It smells positively fresh, and though we never even saw the cleaning staff, the room was spotless every time we returned. Most miraculous of all, it was absolutely silent! We couldn't hear the street, the elevator, or the other guests. The beds are profoundly comfortable and our view was excellent from the 18th floor. Best of all, instead of pretending to be something grander than it was, the room was perfectly designed for tiny living and all the accoutrements were clever, attractive and best of all functional. Every person we encountered on the staff was sweet, warm, funny and genuine, and offered truly useful advice and immediate attention to our every need. Location is great too. Ideal for our girls' business/play trip. Thank you especially to Miguel (happy birthday!), Christine, and Micheal in security who gave us great advice on the bus system.

title: Definitely returning
text: If you’re looking for a luxurious, tidy and clean place to stay this is the place. The room was so clean and comfortable, the staff was nice from check in to check out. I’ve stayed in plenty of hotels but Miguel absolutely made my stay there unforgettable, from his welcoming tone to his phenomenal customer service. I definitely will be returning soon, thank you Miguel you’re the best!

title: A very pleasant experience
text:
To start this review out, we booked through Jet Blue vacations. We stayed for 3 days and 4 nights. Our package included flight and hotel. Because we booked through JetBlue, we also got some goodies like a $25 uber credit and our resort fees paid for. From the moment we checked in, the gentleman who helped us (didn't get his name but he had blonde hair) was very kind to us. Once we got to our room, he gave us a call to confirm everything was great. No one ever does that anymore so thank you!!! That evening, we went out to explore bars and came back around 1 am. Jose at the front desk greeted us and asked us how our experience is so far. We let him know it was great and couldn't believe our resort fees were covered. He then told us because we booked through jetblue, we also would receive an uber credit. That was such a nice surprise! The following day, we noticed our shower was leaking water into our room. We informed the young lady at the desk working the night shift, and she arranged for it to get looked at and also gave us free breakfast for the inconvenience. I also didn't get her name but she was lovely and had a very soft voice. I was pleasantly surprised that every employee had the same mannerism when dealing with guests. I've stayed at other hotels where staff kind of just see this as a job versus aiming to give incredible service. A big shout out to all the staff for making us feel super welcomed and comfortable! 
Shout out to the room which was just the right size. The bed was super comfortable and we had everything we needed. I won't stop recommending this place to my friends and family.
Thanks again!!

title: A friendly, clean and well located hotel
text:
Great, friendly hotel. There is a  genuine warmth about the staff and a positive vibe. Everyone has been really nice - Jestin, Dirmarys and Robert the engineer have given us really quick and friendly service and advice.
The location is great for sight seeing. The rooms are clean and comfortable. We loved the weekend DJ too.

title: Birthday Trip
text: The hotel staff is friendly and accommodating.  Jonathan was the gentleman who checked us in and out.  My daughter and I shared this trip for our birthday, and he was kind with his birthday wishes.  The room was the perfect size.  The location is perfect as it is in Midtown.  It is within walking distance of Times Square and Rockefeller, and it is close to a few of the subway entrances.

title: Lovely Hotel !
text: Beautiful hotel in every way! Loved the Love Letters wall next to reception area & the live music coming from the restaurant. Miguel checked my friends and i in tonight and was nothing but attentive and made sure we had no issues after our long trip to NYC! Would definitely want to stay again. - preferably in the summer season!

title: Exceptional Service!
text: The Innside is my favorite place to stay when visiting New York. The rooms are large and comfortable and the staff are helpful. Miguel at the front desk checked me in and he did an great job as he quick, efficient and even helped me arrange getting additional accomodations for my family! Thanks Miguel!

title: Jose Torres the front desk manager is an angel on earth!
text: 5/5 absolutely gorgeous hotel and Jose Torres really saved my experience! He went above and beyond to anticipate my needs and he is the reason I will be coming back! If more hotels had kind people like Jose, this whole world would be a better place

title: Beautiful
text: We stayed here for 4 days and we felt absolutely safe and welcome every time we entered the doors. We were consistently greeted with a brilliant smile from the reception Jestin he’s is an amazing person who genuinely cares about the people who stay here! Would love to come again 100/10

title: Experiencia hotel
text: Falta mantención, el desayuno incluido no especifica que tipo continental o buffet, pero cuando llegas a la mesa es un desayuno con te o café, agua, sándwich o huevos, cereal o fruta, pero no incluye los jugos, al final pague USD 20 adicionales por persona.

title: 5/5 STAFF
text: INNSiDE is the perfect place for a celebratory weekend! The rooms were clean, quiet, stylish, and functional; the beds and pillows were comfy; and wifi worked very well. The best part of our stay was the staff, specifically Jose, Kit, Jon, Leslie, and Jestin at the front desk. They were friendly, fun, and extremely generous, going above and beyond to accommodate our needs. They let us check in early, offered complimentary wine, and stored our bags after check out. I will definitely visit again in the future!

title: Incredible hotel with amazing staff
text: Several friends and I stayed here early February for a girls weekend and couldn’t be more thrilled that we chose this hotel. From the minute we arrived the staff were warm, kind, and incredibly accommodating. The ambiance, location, and staff make this the perfect place to stay. This will, without a doubt, be my go to location for all future trips to the city. Special shout-out to Jestin, Jose, Kit, Jon, and Leslie who went above and beyond to ensure we had a great stay.

title: AMAZING Experience
text: I couldn’t speak more highly of my experience at the Melia. Not only is the hotel centrally located near several subway stations in a cute area, but the accommodations, the service, the food, and the staff were incredible. I haven’t had better customer service in a long time. Friendly, accommodating, welcoming, helpful. I could go on and on. Jestin, Jose, Kit, Jon, and Leslie were an exceptional team who absolutely MADE our trip. We were on a girl’s weekend, and we were made to feel so special by each member of the staff. Thanks so much to everyone who took care of us!

title: My Favorite Hotel !! 10/10 for sure
text: The room was a 10/10, up to date and modern. The manager Jose was extremely helpful!!  I was super comfortable and felt welcomed. The staff is super hospitable which I love ❤️. My go-to hotel & I Definitely recommend to people staying in the city.

title: BEST HOTEL IN NYC
text: This hotel is the best in NYC. The manager Jose gives the best customer service. The rooms are always clean and stocked with whatever you may need. The receptionist is available 24/7 for all your needs. I will always stay at this hotel when in NYC.

title: New York stay
text: Excellent stay kristina and korina were so helpful and friendly services were brilliant staff very friendly very clean very modern would highly recommend myself my family and friends had a wonderful stay for my husbands 50th Birthday the water etc in.the mini fridges was a nice touch

title: Harlemite partying in Chelsea
text:
New Yorker approved dopest spot to stay, chill and kick it!
The frequency and vibration of the hotel was “spot on”!
You’ve found the experience, you were looking for.
See on the next visit.
Peace!
Service 10
Vibe 10
Room 10
Food 10
Gym 10

title: Excellent, beautiful, modern, 2 thumbs up!
text:
This trip was 3 girlfriends weekend getaway and we had a wonderful experience at the INNSIDE Melia NoMad. Everyone we interacted with at the reception, was very friendly and helpful (Jonathan, Christina, Kima, Kit) and another girl that we didn't ask the name. All very nice and polite. The room with a view, was big, clean and modern, and so was the bathroom. The facilities were beautiful, clean and modern. One of my friends used the gym and loved it. We ate at the restaurant one night and the food was very good. The hotel is also very well located. We walked a lot.
If I could grade this hotel it would be a A+++.

title: OJO a la letra pequeña y precios de la carta
text: Hotel bien situado. Habitación sencilla y bien equipada. Pero cuidado al reservar!! Parece que pagas por ejemplo 300 $ por 2 noches sin desayuno y este precio sale así en la web de Melia . Pero cuando haces el check out, te llevas la sorpresa de que te han cargado un 10% más por las amenities, porque el hotel tiene wifi y gimnasio… me parece vergonzoso que esto se cobre aparte y se informe en letra pequeña, ya que cambia bastante el presupuesto del que se puede disponer para el viaje. Peor aún los precios del restaurante. El desayuno es a la carta, muy muy escueta por cierto. Pagamos 65 $ por 2 capuccinos, un croissant de jamón y queso y una tostada con aguacate y huevo. Robo a mano armada. Y Encima sugieren un mínimo de un 15% de propina. El hotel está muy bien pero me parece fatal que no veas en tu reserva el precio total que vas a pagar con claridad.

title: Fabulous Service, Fresh, Clean & Modern Hotel
text: Upon arrival to the Innside, we were greeted by Denzel, who was welcoming and professional. We received waters, and he held our bags while we got a bite to eat at the Wilson right before closing. During dinner Miquel delivered our bags to our room. Clean, fresh, modern with all the little details that matter! Slippers and a robe which I forgot plus an umbrella and steamer. I will most definitely book here again, tye service and amenities are outstanding. Thank you Denzel & Miquel.

title: Beautiful Hotel definitely recommend 😍
text: Beautiful hotel such nice workers Christina and kima both lovely woman couldn't of asked for better hotel staff hotel rooms always so clean ever day when we come back to them so cosy food is amazing also we will definitely be back thanks very much ❤️  love TESSY

title: Had a pleasant stay at this very good NYC hotel despite some issues
text:
INNSiDE NOMAD shines when it comes to room size, amenities, and housekeeping/cleanliness--all of which are top notch for New York City. In-person check-in was still required for my stay, even when I checked in using the app(?); the front-desk employees seemed overworked and a bit confused, in general. 

Elevators are speedy and get you up and down quickly. The attached Wilson restaurant is adequately nice albeit overpriced. 

The fitness center is adequate for athletes to get in a good pump while traveling.

title: Excelente opción para visitar Nueva York
text: El hotel está situado en la 27st entre la 6 y la 7 av y con el metro muy cerca. Nos alojamos en una habitación de camas dobles con vistas y nos hemos ido encantados, tanto por las vistas nocturnas desde la habitación o mientras tomábamos un café al despertar como por la situación, que nos permitía hacer visitas por la mañana, volver al hotel a dejar las compras y arreglarnos para cenar de forma rápida. En otras estancias nos hemos alojado en otras ubicaciones y no teníamos ese lujo. Atención excelente, sobre todo por parte de Cristina, recepcionista del hotel, que nos ayudó en todo lo que pudo. Muy recomendable para hacer turismo.

title: Amazing
text: My boyfriend and I just stayed here this past weekend and can not recommend this hotel enough.  From the moment we arrived the staff at the front desk was friendly and helpful and  held onto our luggage for us while we explored the city, they also upgraded our room for no reason at all.  The hotel lobby was very inviting and our room was clean, cozy and luxurious.  It was so nice to have a quiet calm space to rest when you're visiting such a busy city.  I can not wait to visit again, we are already planning our next weekend trip back to Inn side by Melia.

title: Good Staycation!
text: Loved the vibe of this place! If you are looking for a quiet, calm place to stay, this is IT!! Our room was pretty clean, the bed felt like a cloud, and it was very quiet during the day & night! Book your room ASAP!

title: Hermoso y moderno hotel en Chelsea
text: Hermoso viaje familiar que nos alojó en Hotel Innside de NY Nomad. Un hotel con  concepto moderno, ventanales amplios, minimalista y artístico. Situado cerca de todo. Muy cálida la recepción y atención de Cristina y de Jestin.

title: Five days in New York
text: Great central place to stay with the breakfast option amazing value. The room had great city views and the drinks in the mini bar hit the right spot. There was a great deli around the corner on 6th avenue. Was only about 20 minutes to the high line. Staff were friendly and very helpful. Big thank you to Denzel and Christina on the front desk. Would definitely stay here again would have been great to use the gym but got my steps in walking around the city.

title: Home away from home
text:
I can’t say enough nice things about this hotel. It truly is my home away from home. I’ve been staying at the Innside Melia in NYC  for 5 years plus and  it’s for good reason.  the staff which I wanna call out,Jonathan, Dirmarys, Jestin, Leslie, Denzel are all Rock Star quality!! Attentive, responsive, accommodating, polite,  service oriented and professional. They’ve gone beyond nice ! 

It’s reasonably priced considering it’s location and after-all it is  NYC. I would recommend this Hotel to all and  I will continue to be a loyal customer. Thank you for making my stay enjoyable!!!!

title: Amazing spot in Chelsea
text: Stayed here with a friend to celebrate her birthday. We arrived via train to Penn Station and were pleased to realize it was a short walk to the hotel, no subway or cab necessary. Check-in was great, reception gave us a gratis bottle of wine to celebrate her birthday! They were very helpful in providing a map and recommendations. Every interaction with front desk staff, approx 3-4 different people throughout the stay, were all amazing. Friendly, helpful and patient. The room was basic overall but the best part were the free drinks in the mini fridge! There were several flavored “adult sodas” (non-alcoholic) and boxes of water, which were delightful to come back to after our adventures around the city. Wish we’d had time to check out the outdoor patio area, it looked very cute and I bet in the warmer months it’s a great vibe. Will definitely return to this hotel!

title: AMAZING STAFF!!!
text: This was my very first time in New York and I’m confident that my friend and I picked THEE BEST hotel for our stay. They took care of our every need. The room was so clean and nice with a gorgeous view! Christina was the sweetest thing with impeccable hospitality. Actually, EVERYONE WAS AMAZING. Miguel, Kima, & Jestin all really went above and beyond. They are truly a top notch team! We will stay here every time we visit! Fyi - the restaurant on the lobby level is The Wilson and it was delicious. The espresso martini knocked our socks off!! The food was just as good so please stop in while staying there! I recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in the Manhattan area!

title: Wonderful Staff and Wonderful Stay Experience
text:
My friends and I visited New York and our stay at the Innside was above five stars, their staff was so wonderful and helped me with everything from our arrival to our departure. I would like thank Kima, Miguel, and Jesten for assisting us with any accommodations we needed during our stay, helping with booking us a car from the airport and to the airport, and for simply being very nice and hospitable. We enjoyed our room, we gazed upon a breathtaking city view, great minibar with water and juice sodas, and comfy robes with the cute slippers. As we continue to visit New York, the Innside will be our hotel destination every time. 

Also, The Wilson (hotel restaurant) was absolutely amazing, I enjoyed the double patty burger and my friends enjoyed the lobster BLT and chicken and waffles. The manager Issac was wonderful and we appreciated our experience.

The Innside by Melia was an overall perfect stay, we had a perfect vacation and that is all thanks to the staff of the Innside by Melia.

title: Perfect location. Perfect hotel
text:
From the first moment we stepped into the lobby, the service provided was excellent.  We were given a welcome gift for our anniversary and the young man on reception was so polite and warm.  

There were four lifts which meant you were never waiting long. We were on the 15th floor with a city view room. The floor to ceiling window made the room light and bright, but you had to have a good head for heights to go close and look out of them!

The room was cleaned daily and the juice and water replenished daily too.  Plenty of coffee pods for the machine. Just lovely! 

The bed was comfy and we always enjoyed a good night's sleep. the only reason that I haven't awarded a 5 star is because on New Year's Eve we were shooed out of the hotel bar for a private party. We had just spent a lot of money on cocktails and were made to feel unwelcome whilst we finished the drinks off.  This experience slightly marred what was otherwise a fantastic second honeymoon!

Would recommend this hotel in a heartbeat. Will definitely stay here again when holidaying in New York!

title: Expected more from a 4 star hotel in NYC.  Not staying here again
text:
Hidden "resort fee" of 40+ / day at check-in 
Bed worn out
camode too tall
"free" hotel branded water had a gross aftertaste
no premium tv channels
noise pollution from garbage trucks all night long
Ill informed staff telling me wrong begin-end time for breakfast
juices and other free beverages allegedly in my room fridge I never saw

title: Amazing staff service  and hotel facilities
text: It was an amazing  stay, design is clean and modern, room was spacious and clean. I had a pleasant  time at this hotel thanks yo the staff. Kima, Christina and Jestin were really friendly and provided me an excellent service. Really oriented to hospitality. They have listened to all my questions and inquiries and did their best to attend me. Next time in NYC definitively will come back to this hotel.

title: The staff make the experience perfect
text:
We were in town for my 40th birthday and stayed here for 2 nights. From the minute we stepped in, the staff were helpful and courteous. The personality and attention to detail that we experienced from staff was above average for many hotels. They all need a raise! 
Huge perk for us is that this hotel is rated LGBTQ friendly. We felt right at home.
The Wilson restaurant is right across from the hotel check in desk. We purchased hot drinks as soon as we checked in as we were freezing. Two lattes were $18 so pay attention to price tag if you are new to buying in NYC.
We booked a king suite with a city view. Our view was straight into some apartments in a building across the street. Not exactly the romantic view we had anticipated but we survived. The water got hot right away, which we loved. Being on the 14th floor, you would expect some delay. The pillows are very soft and squishy, if you are a firm pillow person this might not work for you. The TV was easy to navigate; we primarily used the Chromecast feature. There's nothing in the room to give direction or suggestions for meals, sights, etc. I would have preferred a 'staff recommended" booklet/print out of places within walking distance besides The Wilson.

Places we found within 1-2 blocks-= Gregory's Coffee and Nangman BBQ (6th Street). The BBQ place is Korean food and so delicious! There's also a Duane Reade pharmacy right around the corner for any toiletries or other needs. 

The hotel is able to hold your luggage after checkout.. That is extremely helpful if you plan to do anything on your last day. 

10/10 recommend the hotel.

title: The Best Hotel in Chelsea
text: My friends and I had a getaway weekend. The staff ( Jonathan, Kit, Christina, Kima, and others) were fantastic and they were  the most kind people you’ll ever meet! The room was immaculate and everything you need was there. They  even provide water and juice. The robes and the slippers were bonus! If you want to stay in Chelsea, you MUST stay at Innside Melina! Thank you for the fun weekend and we will be back!

title: Gute Lage des Hotels
text: Sehr schöner Eingangsbereich, zentrale Lage des Hotels. Restaurant teuer und Karte nur online gefunden , keine ausgehängte Speisekarte. Scheinbar keine kleineren Gerichte im Angebot. Zimmer sehr sauber undPersonal freundlich.

title: Hotel tranquilo y bien situado
text: Muy práctico, bien situado, muy limpio , personal amable,tiene un Restaurante bastante Bueno para poder cenar tranquilamente pensando en que esta en Nueva York es un buen Hotel para estar una semana de turismo y fenomenal para trabajo en la ciudad.

title: Amazing Experience
text:
The hospitality and customer service was super. We stayed at the hotel for 13 day and we have had the most amazing people looking after us. Denzel , Johnathan, Leslie, Kit , Christina and Kim the office manager where absolutely superb. The hotel location is great and close to 34th Street, 5th Avenue and time Square. The rooms where big and spacious and cleaned everyday. I'm definitely coming back again .
Just thank you so all your help and support you provided while we were there.

title: Great hotel
text: Great hotel, perfect location. Rooms spacious and clean. Beds comfy however the air conditioning/heating unit was rather noisy and disturbed sleep if left on during the night. My only gripe is the $40 per room per night charge for ‘hotel services’ which included unlimited use of the mini bar, however this only contained water and sparkling blackcurrent, extortionate charge for such items.

title: Good Vibes
text: This hotel have good hospitaly, very fast wifi connection, TV cable channel, and good view for business trip in 12 floor, so you can work from here with new york city landscape in your room. Last but not least the facility is complete for family and couple or business trip

title: Okay stay, but prepare yourself for the extra fees
text: Great rooms, great location.  But be aware there is an extra £35 per room per night fee that we weren't aware of until we checked out.  This fee wasn't because we used the minibar or anything, it is applied to every stay as a flat extra fee.  We booked through an airline (British Airways) so we therefore weren't aware of this fee when booking. I get the impression this is fairly common behaviour for hotels in NY, so just be aware that the advertised price for a room at Innside Nomad is not the final price you will pay.  Staff handled it well when we pointed out that we weren't told about this fee when we checked in, but still, hidden fees always sour an otherwise good stay.

title: Fantastic Christmas stay
text:
My wife and I visited NYC from the UK over Christmas and stayed at the INNSiDE for a 4 night stay, and we couldn't have been more pleased with our (very well and heavily researched!) choice.

Welcomed by very friendly staff at the front desk after a long flight and then cab ride from JFK...check-in was a breeze, yet informative, and we were in our room within 10 minutes or so. This is how it should be done.

Our room was a very decent size, especially by NYC standards, and I understand that in general most rooms at the INNSiDE are. With a separate toilet/bathroom with a huge rainfall shower, the main room had a king size bed (which was very comfy), desk, TV, and decent closet space...which of course is also hard to come by in some city hotels. We also had a great view downtown...such a great cityscape!

Oh and big shout out and huge kudos to them for supplying water boxes in their rooms and not plastic bottles. This form of sustainability and recycling is the way forward! 

The whole hotel is modern, well decorated and has some great art in place throughout. Can't speak much of the restaurant and bar, but it looked lovely and welcoming.

Located in Chelsea, it is about a 20 minute walk from Time Square, but generally well situated to reach all the sights and landmarks of Manhattan. There are several subways nearby too, with 5+ mins of walking, which gives you much further access to the city.

Could not recommend this hotel more and have already mentioned it to our UK friends. Keep up the great work, this place is a gem!

title: Schönes Hotel mit äußerst hilfsbereitem Personal
text: Wir waren das 1. Mal in New York und waren vor allem von der Freundlichkeit des Personals und der New Yorker im allgemeinen positiv überrascht! Vor allem Christina möchte ich lobend hervorheben, die all unsere Fragen geduldig beantwortet hat und uns immer hilfsbereit zur Seite stand, egal wie stark der Andrang an der Rezeption auch war. Hotel selber ist zentral gelegen, Zimmer sind modern, hell und sauber, Bad geräumig, vor allem die Dusche. Einzig mit den schmalen Doppelbetten und nur einer gemeinsamen Decke, hatten wir unsere liebe Not. Das sind wir von zuhause nicht gewohnt, hier hat jeder seine eigene Matratze und seine eigene Decke. ;-)

title: Fin de Año en New York.
text: Experiencia positiva, muy bien situado cerca de Times Square a pocos minutos a pie, habitación pequeñita pero suficiente, muy bien aislada de ruido, trato amable y bilingüe, se respiraba un ambiente muy familiar. Recomendable.

title: Ubicación y servicio de 10!
text:
Fui a finales de noviembre coincidiendo con mi cumpleaños y  incluso tuvieron un detalle conmigo esperándome en la habitación a mi llegada.
Ubicación genial, trato perfecto y desayuno increíble. Definitivamente volvería!

title: Great Customer Service (as always)
text: We go to NYC to visit family a couple of times a year and we always stay at the Melia with no issues and love it. The rooms are clean, location is GREAT, and the food at the Wilson is always better than we remember it- with a great scene!  They also gave us good tips on parking in the area. This year at check in we had an issue with the wrong rooms- we had reserved adjoining, family rooms.  I spoke with Tim and he was able to fix it quickly for me-- even though they were nearly booked. I was impressed with how he worked with me and resolved the issue.  The rest of staff were friendly and fun-- Isaac, Christina, Leslie, Kim - and Jestin at the Wilson was AMAZING as well.  He kept putting things on the house for us which helped me grieve France's loss in the World Cup! :)    They just reminded me why we stay there every time.  I recommend Melia to everyone traveling to NYC.

title: Meliá nunca falla...
text:
Una semana fantástica.

Hotel nuevo, céntrico y con un personal encantador.

Nos alojamos dos adultos y dos niños en dos habitaciones conectadas lo que hace que la estancia sea muy cómoda (para peques y sobre todo para padres)

Tuvimos mucha suerte con las vistas (planta 18) ¡Increíbles! 

No hicimos uso del restaurante (aunque siempre estaba lleno) pero si del gimnasio.

Cortesía en las habitaciones de agua, zumos y café todos los días. Limpieza de la habitación muy buena y no hemos tenido ningún inconveniente con AA, aguas u otros suministros que a veces traen de cabeza a uno en los hoteles.

El personal de recepción muy agradable y dispuesto a ayudar en todo lo que se precisa. La verdad es que Meliá suele tener un equipo humano muy bueno.

title: GRACIAS
text: queremos agradecer el trato recibido por el personal del hotel, en especial en recepción a Cristina y LESLIE por su amabilidad y ayuda en todo momento así como al excelenete servicio de limpieza de habitaciones

title: Muy recomendable, còmodo y tranquilo para el descanso. Repetiremos
text: Lo primero de todo es su ubicación. Está cerca de todo en Nueva York, pero fuera del bullicio de los alrededores de Times Square, y tiene muy cerca el metro de la 28st. Las habitaciones con la cama y las almohadas muy còmodas. El personal de recepción súper amable en todo momento y atentos a cualquier cuestión, sobre todo resaltar el atento trato que nos prestò Christina, el día que hicimos el checkout nos ayudó a pedir el transporte hasta el aeropuerto, y con la custodia de las maletas, nos las guardaron para poder dedicar ese último día a visitar más lugares. Muy recomendable!!! Volveremos

title: Like Meeting New People?
text: I had the pleasure of being checked into, and walking into, someone else’s room. Make sure to ask if the room selected comes with roommates, haha. Otherwise it was a very nice hotel that would have been awesome to stay at.

title: Grata Experiencia
text:
Hospedarnos en Innside by Meliá en Nueva Yotk fue una grata experiencia, mi esposa y yo fuimos a celebrar nuestro aniversario de bodas, desde el momento en que llegamos recibimos una atención muy amable.

Gracias Hector por tu excelente servicio. Sin duda volveremos a este lugar.

Además las instalaciones son muy bonitas, el restaurante muy rico y el cuarto muy cómodo.

title: Nice hotel convenient location.
text:
Nice hotel, great location, room was reasonable size for New York. Only criticism is the size of the beds Standard doubles in a double double and having to ask for room to be serviced as we returned for the evening to find the room as we had left it in the Morning. But this was soon attended to when we asked. 

Was able to check out later - when we asked. 

Staff were really helpful. 

Would use again if we were back in New York.

title: Another WONDERFUL stay at Innside by Melia New York NOMAD!
text: Another wonderful stay at this amazing hotel. This is the perfect place to stay...location, price and the service could not be better.  Denzel and Johnathan took great care of assisting me with several things...and I was grateful for their detailed information.  This stay was wonderful, as before, and I look forward to the next visit!

title: Excellent option!
text:
Very good location, excellent for vacation an explore NYC.
Very easy to come an go from the hotel. Restaurant an bar are good options.
The atmosphere is nice, rooms comfortable and clean, just what you need for sleep and then go to enjoy NYC!

title: Great location and vibe
text:
Fantastic location. Staff were extremely friendly. Rooms were really nice. Beds very comfy. Ate in the bar and the food was delicious. 
I would definitely recommend here to stay.
One thing we that annoyed me was the €35 per night charge that we didn't know about until we were checking out.

title: Nice hotel, well located
text: Very nice hotel, nice room, well located. The gym is very nice, has a good size and offers all important things you need to workout. Everything in the hotel seams new and in good condition. I loved the complimentary mini bar in the room. I’d book this hotel again.

title: Ms kunaka
text: Wow . The guys at reception were extremely helpful and courteous especially Hector , Denzel and Liz. The hotel is very clean and fresh . It is thoroughly cleaned . I would recommend this hotel for business travelers .

title: Wonderful hotel and staff!
text:
Love this hotel! Such a good location for a holiday visit! The rooms are a good size for NYC and the amenities were lovely. 

And the staff was amazing… Liz and Denzel took care of us when we checked in. We flew in on a red eye so our kids were pooped and Denzel made sure we were comfortable while waiting for our room and got us an earlier check in. He and Liz were welcoming and friendly. They made the experience fabulous for our family!

title: Christmas in NYC
text: We were very satisfied with the cleanliness and good vibe of this hotel. I would definitely stay here again. The front desk staff were incredibly pleasant and professional. The hotel was also decorated very festive for the holidays! 🌲🎅❄️

title: Poca limpieza por lo que se presupone en Meilá
text: No usen este hotel. Empieza a estar muy usado, con alfombras en mal estado en los pasillos, claro indicador de uso extremo y poco mantenimiento, y una habitación no con días o meses sin limpiar, sino que hay zonas de la habtación sin limpiar des de hace años. No dejar cosas encima del armario... Se limpia lo justo y sin ser curosos o eficientees. Aún ofreciendo compensación por no publicar el mal estado, confirmado por el manager, no pedimos compensación, solo 2 toallas para la ducha, y aún estamos esperando. Tienen un problema y se soluciona o bien formando mejor a su pesonal, o bien incrementando su personal. No es problema del personal es problema de la relacón calidad / precio que quieran ofrecer. No volveremos.

title: Some hiccups...
text: This is a relatively pricey hotel so you would expect everything to be perfect.  However, we had no hot water in the shower and didn't have time to wait for someone to come fix it.  We also sat at the bar and it was FREEZING, there was a cold breeze blowing on us the whole time, and other people said the same thing.  But the woman who oversaw the front desk was very helpful and polite and provided me with some things I had forgotten to pack, so that was nice.  But really, these other issues should not have cropped up in a small, boutique hotel like this.

title: Hidden Gem
text: I am avid fan of NYC staycations and this hotel was definitely one if my favorite stays. I originally booked a double room and was upgraded to the suite. The suite was absolutely gorgeous and spacious. The balcony had an amazing view. The staff throughout the hotel was so kind and attentive. No extra or hidden charges. Everything looked brand new. The lightening is perfect for taking great pics and doing your makeup. Special shout out to Kima, Justin, Miguel, Liz and Denzel for making my stay everything and more.

title: Christmas break
text: Stayed here for 4 nights with my wife and 3 teenage daughters, we had a family loft apartment which worked out brilliantly as the girls had their own room with adjoining door. Great location for exploring the whole of Manhattan and the staff were exceptional, couldn’t do enough for you, Justin, Leslie and Denzel on the front desk were brilliant, would definitely come back.

title: Better Than Average For NY, BUT
text:
NY hotel prices are even more crazy than usual at the moment, relative to others the rate here was reasonable.

Rooms ‘compact’ especially the bathroom but I suppose for NY larger than others for this price bracket.

Good reception team and housekeeping (apart from a stained toilet that never seemed to be cleaned), air-con all fine and not a lot of corridor noise on a high floor. 

Wilson’s restaurant has a good menu and a fresh design, a nice change from the usual hotel restaurant style. Food quality was good. But, let down by serious disorganisation at breakfast, ran out of bacon, very very slow to take orders, have to hunt down an (overworked) server for coffee top ups, no eye contact all whilst the host sits and taps away at his tablet with seemingly no awareness of the poor level of customer service.

10 minutes' walk from Penn Station in a street with less than usual city street noise. 

Sort breakfast organisation in the restaurant and its good stay.

title: Parfait pour un weekend à NYC
text:
Nous sommes partis en amoureux pour ce weekend de Black Friday.
Chambre très calme , très bonne literie
Très propre, moderne.
Bien placé (times Square à 10 Min à pied) Métro 1 tout proche.
Très bon rapport qualité prix

title: Séjour Hotel INNSiDE Melia NY
text:
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à l’hôtel INNSIDE Melia NY.
Merci à Jestin, Kit & Kima, une équipe très accueillante et attentionnée👌
Nous reviendrons dans cet hôtel idéalement placé.
Le petit déjeuner est excellent est bien servit.
Les chambres sont propres et agréable, avec une très bonne literie.
Animation le soir avec un DJ au bar.
Tout était parfait  👌

title: Good Place. Great Staff
text: Staff was great, especially Jonathon on evening desk, who went above and beyond to help with special requests. Large rooms. New and clean. Very modern vibe and Pretty good location. Bar is too expensive.

title: Looking forward to staying there again.
text: My stay at Innside New York NoMad exceeded my expectations. The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. The open mini bar was a very nice surprise. It was convenient not having to leave the room for water or a beverage. The room was spacious and the bed comfortable! Highly recommend staying there if in NYC. Will stay there again!

title: Innside New York NoMad a hidden Gem
text: Innside New York NoMad was like finding a diamond in the rough.  It was not only perfectly priced (low) especially for NYC, but it was perfectly placed in a spot that was easy to get around.  The Subway is right around the corner to get downtown, uptown or midtown.  It was quiet at nigh- unlike Time Square and we felt safe.   The staff including Kima and Kit as well as the super fantastic women who kept out room looking spectacular    were all wonderful!   The room was clean, and we could move!   They also had food service if you needed it!  This is the best place to stay in between everything!  Plus a work out studio, a great backyard patio!  You are in the PINK if you stay here!   I will certainly be coming back!  Thanks again Kima and Kit!  P Eldridge

title: Perfect stay in New York
text:
I’ve had the best experience in this hotel . The location is ideal to go everywhere easily. The staff is so friendly and professional . Special thanks to Jose, Kit, Jesten, Jonathan, Dirmarys, Ozzy and last but not least our dear Kima ! 
And the breakfast is delicious !

title: Amazing hotel and Amazing staff
text: When I'm going to New York usually going somewhere else but for this trip my usual hotel was closed and I found Innside Nomad and believe I loved it, hotel has amazing location, the room are clean and spacious and the restaurant The Wilson the food is excellent (we did all breakfast) ..  but the most important for me and my family is to say : a big big Thanxs you to Christina and Kima at the lobby are the Best so nice friendly professional and always took time to help you and answer positively my demands... Gracias girls ... we will be back for them and the hotel of course

title: Amazing Experience in INNSIDE NEW YORK Nomad!
text: Amazing experience! The hotel is located in the heart of New York. Great & friendly staff, lovely & tasty breakfast. Room very clean and with breathtaking views from the city. Highly recommended if you are visiting New York. Just   Incredible!

title: Miguel Worked so hard to make a stay special.
text: Miguel Candalero is a credit to Meliá. Someone who works hard to make sure guests are looked after. I’m in France so a chapeau! Or in Spanish un sombrero 🎩 People who go out of their way deserve recognition.

title: Work trip
text:
3.5 stars

Because I was in town for a work event, I had no say as to what hotel I'd stay at. Well - that's not entirely true; our team did give me the option to stay at a different spot, but since all of our special guests were being put up here, it made sense for me to be here, as well.

The hotel was decent for the three nights I was here, but it's not something I would choose for myself. It was comfortable enough, and the location was good for our purposes (the event space was just over a mile away, easily walkable for our group.)

My room was much larger than I'd expected, but I did notice a faint odor when I first walked in. It was quite sewer-y, but it was close. The odor never quite faded over the course of my stay. 

There was a small table in the corner near the windows where I was able to plug in to work the one day I had to skip the event. The bed was okay, a bit too thin and crickety for my preference. I didn't get great sleep while I was there, not sure if that was due to stress, the bed and thin pillows or something else altogether.

The bathroom featured my favorite thing about the room: that shower! Two shower heads with incredible water pressure, it definitely helped soothe the stress in my shoulders and prep me for the hectic days ahead. There was hardly any counter space to speak of, so if you're one who travels with skin, hair and tooth tools galore, be prepared to get creative.

They did offer a few free drinks within the room itself, which was a nice bonus. There were still water options as well as a couple of "grown up sodas", whatever that means. 

I'm removing a star because on my second night, I noticed that the deadbolt stopped working. It slid through if the door wasn't closed, but once I keyed in and closed the door behind me, I wasn't able to get the deadbolt to click through. I called to ask for help, and they told me it'd be taken care of. But it never was. I stopped by the front desk the next morning to follow up, but again nothing came of it. 

The lobby was a hub of activity and people. On my first night there, they had a DJ set up in the corner. My friend, who happened to be in town at the same time, had come to my hotel to meet me for dinner and while she was waiting in the lobby for me to come down (you need a keycard to work the elevators in both directions), she texted "you're staying in a party hotel!"

The lobby restaurant is called "The Wilson", and if you're on the street looking for hotel signage, you'll likely see the restaurant's sign before anything else. I did have my last meal there, hosting a handful of the guests that were still in town; that'll be a separate review.

Overall it wasn't a terrible experience, but the odor and the broken deadbolt did leave a bad taste in my mouth. I do know our guests were at least comfortable in their rooms scattered throughout the hotel, and that's the most important piece to me.

title: Great base to explore New York
text:
Just back from staying four nights at this hotel. All in all it was a sound base for our trip and would stay again. A great location. The room was clean and tidy, and the coffee facilities in the room were very nice, along with the availability of soft drinks and water as part of the Facility Fee. The reception staff are also very friendly.

I do feel a bit disappointed that, despite requesting a city view well in advance, that we were on the 6th floor facing an office. I also emailed ahead to arrange some drinks to be placed in the room on arrival (which I advised I would pay for on check in) as it was for my wife's 40th birthday. Despite an email confirming this was ok it never happened so a bit disappointing.

title: Comfy Beds and Excellent Customer Service
text: I love this hotel. The bed and pillows were super comfy. My only complaint is the bathroom wall is glass and if you turn on the bathroom light in the middle of the night, the  hotel room lights up too. The coffee in the room was delicious and I liked the mugs that are provided. We had a small issue with housekeeping confusing our cocktail shaker and martini glasses as belonging to the hotel. The entire staff, especially Martha Z in housekeeping went above and beyond to resolve the mixup to our satisfaction. Customer service was excellent all around. I hope I am lucky enough to stay here again.

title: mala experiencia en el hotel
text: Escribo para comentar mi mala experiencia en este hotel, empezamos por lo bueno (hotel agradable, limpio, bien ubicado) el resto bastante mal ( primero no nos dejaron pagar por transferencia ni en metálico solo con tarjeta, teníamos una reserva con 3 habitaciones pues el lio que se montaron en recepción fue tal que a mi me cobraron 2 habitaciones con 1 semana de diferencia sin saberlo(primer importe el dia de llegada y el otro importe una vez regresado a Barcelona habiendo pagado cada familia su habitación el día de llegada), aun a día de hoy no lo entiendo y tuve que sufragar el precio nada barato de 2 habitaciones(sin decirme nada), nos dijeron que el desayuno era buffet (mentira) es a la carta (hay que decir que aceptable pero no lo indicado), que casualidad que de 7 noches en el hotel en 5 días la cafetera en el desayuno(lo teníamos incluido) estaba estropeada en cambio cada noche para cenar (pagando una pasta) increíble que siempre funcionaba, a parte se cobraron 100 dolares por habitacion de resguardo que a las 2 semanas nos ingresarían de nuevo en cuenta, pues han pasado 1 mes y seguimos sin cobrar un solo dólar, me ha sorprendido bastante negativamente que siendo un Meliá donde me he alojado muchas veces en distintas partes del mundo me haya ocurrido todo esto, por tanto sintiéndolo mucho esta vez no aconsejaría a nadie este hotel.

title: Mr
text: Excelente experiencia en el hotel! Habitaciones y servicio impecable. El bar / restaurante con muy buen clima y riquisimo menu! La atención del personal excelente!Cristina nos solucionó todo lo que le pedimos y consultamos! Siempre bien dispuesta y alegre. Un placer disfrutar la experiencia innside!

title: Great customer service by Christina
text: Christina made the experience so much better , the front desk service is simply the best , not only are able to help , but exceed every expectation plus the amenities and the rooms are perfect !! What really made the difference was Christina service along with kit and Kima!

title: Great hotel, great location
text: We booked INNSIDE Nomad for a family vacation in NYC.  We had a “family loft” (connected rooms, one king, one twin beds) for our children and grandchildren, and a king room for ourselves.  Check-in was great.  Kima was especially helpful, ensuring that our room was next to the rest of the family and making us feel very welcome.  The hotel staff were generally very accommodating and attentive.  The rooms were spotless and comfortable, with a small fridge stocked daily with water and juices.  The location was ideal, relatively quiet, but walking distance to almost all we wanted to do (theaters, restauramts, High Line, Empire State, Macys) with good transportation options (subway, bus stops) nearby.  We included breakfasts in our booking and ate a few additional times in the onsite restaurant, The Wilson.   The service was a bit spotty, but the food was quite good.  All in all, we were very pleased with our stay.

title: Consistently comfortable
text:
I've been staying here for nearly a decade.  It's my go-to place when in NYC.  The biggest draw has always been the amazing staff.  Special nod to Akhlima for always making me feel like any request is no problem.  Overall the wonderful front of house team, including Kit and Hector, keep things running smoothly and ensure a good stay.

The beds are incredibly comfy.  The rooms are sparse, but well-equipped.  They have definitely been adding more little touches over the years (yoga mat, slippers, upgraded drinks in the fridge) and the bathrobes are the best.  The toiletries are sufficient but could be much improved.  In general the bathroom could use a refresh, but it's fine and the shower is good.

The public areas of the hotel have become super stylish over the years.  The change to the Wilson restaurant and the addition of Rose's garden has been great and make staying on-property for an evening much more attractive.  Also the fitness room is so much nicer being on the top floor.  Putting a few Pelotons in the studio room would be game-changing.  :-)

Overall, I really like this hotel and it the reliably friendly staff always make it feel like coming home!

title: When your holidays turns from disappointing to good
text: We arrived very tired and the room we booked was very very small, two double beds and a bathroom cannot fitting with 4 people of my family. Than we asked Justin at the front desk and the following day he received the OK from the manager Kima and got upgraded in a very nice a spacious room. Well, I want to rate 5 because they found a solution, bu I must also say the first room was really really unfitted. Thanks a lot anyway

title: A Real Mixed Bag
text:
We have just returned from a 5-night stay at the Innside Melia, this hotel is a real mixed bag:

Pros:

1.	Location – you are in the middle of everything with good transport links
2.	Modern, quiet rooms with lots of natural light
3.	Coffee and waters in room are a nice touch
4.	Free Wifi is great 

Cons:

1.	Staff are overall lovely but some of the restaurant staff are a bit clueless
2.	Rooms are tidied every day but not cleaned.  Indeed, the rooms are not spotless on arrival and if this is an issue for you then best stay elsewhere
3.	Location – Midtown is a bit of a dump now and while convenient for transport I never felt safe there
4.	No kettle in room so if you are a tea drinker best to pack a travel kettle

If visiting NYC again I wouldn’t stay here.  We got this hotel as part of a package and I definitely wouldn’t spend the daily amount on it, it’s just not worth it.   I think there is better in NYC for less.

title: Cargos tarjeta indebidos
text: Cuidado con el depósito de la tarjeta de crédito, me han cargado de forma incorrecta 800 dólares en la tarjeta en dos cargos distintos, dejándome la tarjeta bloqueada al exceder el límite por estos dos cargos.

title: Above & Beyond Customer Service
text: Christina, Kit, Justin Thanks for ALL your Assistance. I had an Important Meeting. The Staff, placed me in a Room, in a low noise area of the floor. I had Great Meeting, Needed a late check out, Needed to Leave my Bags . Staff, made it all Possible with a smile. Way to Relieve Stress Thanks, Guys. #Robinisfunny

title: Muy buena ubicación
text:
Buena ubicación, entre la 7th y la 6th.  
la habitacion para ser Manhattan es amplia, la limpieza diaria y perfecta, todos los días reponen agua, café y refrescos.
El armario más que suficiente.    Nosotros estuvimos en la planta 15, y mas que bien.  Por la tarde amenizan la entrada con música, y se agradece bastante, accedes con una sonrisa.. 

A 5min del Flatiron Building, a 15min (y caminamos ligero) de Broadway..Para llegar allí, recomiendo la 7th,   el ambientillo de la 6th es muy deprimente..triste. 

El resto, simplemente genial.

Recomendar la atención de Leslie, nos hizo la estancia muy fácil.

Francamente, está cerca de todo, pero sin la masividad de otras zonas.
Metro a 3 min.,  
Una sugerencia, sería  llegar hasta justo la calle de arriba, por la mañana y disfrutar de todos los puestos de flores y plantas, por un momento crees no estar en en bullicio de la NY.

title: Pésimo servicio y atención
text:
Nos dejaron la Habitación sin hacer la mitad de los días y nos hicieron cargos en la tarjeta sin autorización (nos dijeron que sólo era para la fianza por posible uso del minibar).
La habitación muy pequeña y el cuarto de baño más pequeño aún.

title: Great experience, Christine was lovely
text:
Really nice and modern hotel. Christine at the reception was exceptional!
The room is a designed in a convenient manner. The only downside of our stay was that the safe locked twice and we had to call a tech, other than that it was perfect. Great location

title: Charge my card without consent.
text: Charge me twice for city tax. I had paid on a pre loaded credit card  and put a different card against incidentals. The hotel then without my consent took city tax from the second card after I had left.  I emailed the hotel 5 times and they responded once asking the name on booking and then have ignored my request since.

title: Amazing customer service, great location!!
text:
I have stayed at many hotels in NY and I really loved Innside. The staff was incredible.  We were driving into NYC and had many bags in the car (always a hassle). We met Jestin at the desk and he was so kind and graciously came out to help us unload with a baggage cart. It was such a warm welcome - and so unlike many NYC hotels. His hospitality only continued as the day went on. Thank you Jestin. The overall service was exceptional as every need was met whether it be ice, directions or anything else needed. Upon leaving the street closed in front of the hotel for construction and another great staff member Kit was so kind to help us push the baggage cart half way down the street to 7th avenue in order to load in the car - unheard of in NYC. 
The hotel itself is cozy, room very nice and clean, nicely styled and equipped with everything we needed. One exceptional gesture was the free soda's in the mini-frig - unheard of in any other hotel I have stayed at.

title: Comfortable and cozy boutique hotel
text:
Modern yet cozy boutique hotel in a good location.
Pros:
The hotel and rooms are well appointed.  You can order a coffee service setup to your room.
Comfortable bed!
Hotel reception staff was very welcoming and helpful when I had business needs.
Complimentary bottles of water were unlimited!
Rooms are smaller but you don’t feel cramped at all.
Rooms are a little noisy in the am of facing the street since there are deliveries that start early.
The outdoor space is great for a casual meet up with friends.
The location is convenient - there is a wine shop, Starbucks, and restaurants within a 5 min walk.  The vegan coffee shop is very close by and has yummy breakfast sandwiches and I’m not even vegan. 
Cons:  The hotel restaurant closed as I was checking in so I didn’t get to experience it and  room service wasn’t an option by 8 pm.

title: Excellent Manhattan Hotel
text:
Just returned from an amazing week in the Big Apple - spent ages looking for our ideal hotel before booking and have to say The Innside by Melia - West 27th Street, Manhattan more than lived up to expectations. Fantastic location- short walk to the Empire State Building and Macey”s - around a 20 minute walk to Times Square and just one block from the subway that takes you uptown or downtown in minutes. 
We booked a king size, city view room - worth every penny - floor to ceiling windows looking out onto the Manhatten skyline - the H&M tower directly ahead from our room . The room itself was superb - sleek modern design,  immaculately clean and very well serviced by the housekeeping team - , bed was super comfortable - storage perfect , iron and board provided - which was used frequently -  excellent shower and bathroom in general - cosy dressing gowns provided. 
There is a great restaurant and bar-  The Wilson - which is part of the hotel -  service and food excellent.
The reception staff are just soooo helpful and friendly . They were more than happy to store our luggage on our last day and ordered a taxi for us on our return to get us to the airport.  
This is quite simply an excellent hotel - I have recommended to friends already and would not Hesitate  to book again when we return - as of course we have simply got to return to NYC - it is an amazing city - hardly scratched the surface in our first ever week in Manhattan.

title: Great Location, Great Staff!
text:
This review is for the Front Desk Manger, Miguel Candelario. 
I went to NY with a few friends for a birthday. I called the hotel last minute (week of the trip) inquiring about hotel decorations for the birthday occasion. I was informed the Guest Experience Manger will not be in to accommodate the request, but Miguel stepped in and was happy to carry-out the request. I was able to order decorations and balloons and have it delivered to Miguel at the hotel. Miguel was very accommodating. He followed instructions and had the room set up the way it was requested. His response was prompt and I didn't have a problem reaching him. There were a few hiccups with the room itself, but Miguel was able to address the issue quickly. Thank you for accommodating my request and making our stay a pleasurable one. Will definitely return again. Thank you, Miguel!

title: Great Hotel - Great Neighborhood - Great Staff - Terrific
text:
My stay at the Innside NY Nomad hotel in Chelsea was terrific! Arriving super early before check-in,  the Most Amazing duo, Leslie and Jonathan, greeted me, (checked me in  (but room not ready at that time as it was very early} and I was able to leave bag until later.   The same happened on my leaving as I had a very late flight and Leslie and Jonathan once again retained my bags. Their expertise and knowledge of the hospitality industry is amazing.  Besides that they were friendly and fun!!!
The  Innside is a very comfortable hotel, sleek and modern, not my style normally, but I loved it.   It took a few times to figure out how to turn on the desk lamp, and what I thought was a room fan was actually a floor lamp, etc. but, hey, I'm old...lol  
It is 1/2 block from the Fashion Institute of Technology and great restaurants all around.  It's convenient to the Village (going south) and Broadway, Midtown, Transportation hubs like Penn Station, and tons of shopping going North.   Once you are below 34th street it is a quiet neighborhood.   Amenities seem to be great and room was spic and span.   Loved my stay there! and will stay again, hopefully soon.

title: Nice hotel
text: Very nice looking lobby and restaurant. I had a standard queen room which was clean but a little clinical and not very cosy. There were no additional comforts so I had to ask for a blanket which they were happy to provide. They have everything else you need including hairdryer, iron, tv and small desk. These rooms don’t have a view but the floor to ceiling windows are a nice touch. If I went again I would certainly pay the extra for a slightly bigger room with a view as the location is spot on if you want to be close enough to Mid town but be in a nice quiet area and I think the views are of the Empire State which is lovely. I would also pay the additional to have breakfast included as the prices are very high for very small portions although I don’t think the avocado eggs were freshly cooked which was a shame given how expensive it was but other items looked nice and it’s a cool restaurant and bar. My mini bar in the room was only stocked with water and low calorie sodas I’ve never heard of, I’m mentioning this as they seem to have this free mini bar as a selling point but there’s no food or alcohol so don’t get too excited. Still, was grateful for the fridge and two small bottles of water a day. There is a coffee machine but you only get two pods a day and some long life coffee mate milk. Another thing to be aware of is the compulsory resort fees of around $40 per room per night. I would stay here again in a better room because of the location if the price was right.

title: Fantastic Hotel with a great Skyline view
text:
Nice Skyline View in the "King Size Skyline-Room" in the upper levels (19th). Many thanks to the cleaning staff. The rooms are always very clean and tidy (not a matter of course in New York's Hotels )

My girlfriend had birthday during our stay, so we were able to celebrate in a great location.
Thanks a lot to Leslie M. (Front Desk)!! Very helpful and approachable in every situation always with a nice and friendly smile.....

Last not least the hotel restaurant downstairs is also recmmended. Small Menu card (positive sign!!). We had the Catch of the day  salmon with spicy tomatosauce and broccoli, the new york strip with mushrooms (Day 2) and the calamaris, the chicken brick and the homemade pasta bolognese with  parmigiano and ricotta (Day 1)...very good food quality and all meals are perfectly prepared ..compliments to the chef and his team....looking forward to Day 3.

The hotel staff is what makes the difference to other Hotels/Hotel Groups.

title: Great Hotel Experience
text:
The Innside is great hotel in an amazing area of New York City, Nomad. Rooms are very bright and very clean. The Hotel Staff is what makes your experience here memorable in a very positive way. EVERYONE is so so nice, and so willing to assist you in any way they can. Shout out to Kit and Christina of the Front Desk, and Andrew.
Highly recommend this hotel!

title: Highly recommended
text: Great hotel, great value, good location. Room clean, very spacious for New York, functional and comfortable. But above all it was the service that is exceptional! Every single person I encountered in my 5 night stay was genuinely friendly and interested in provided the best service possible with zero attitude (again, not common in NYC  hotels). Thank you all for making my stay so pleasant. Especial shout out to Maggie!

title: Great first stay!!
text: Our first stay at Innside won’t be our last. Booked the room the day of our stay directly through the hotel company (Melia). The rep gave us a very good rate as soon as I told her I had gotten a lower rate through a 3rd party. The front desk staff was very professional, friendly and helpful. Christina was so nice and informed us of the special FIT rate, since our daughter is a student there. The room was spotless. We had a great view of the city from the 20th floor. The room decor was contemporary, sparse but chic. Nice touches- complimentary bottles of water and soda in the fridge, robes, a nespresso machine and an umbrella to borrow, if needed. The bed and pillows were sooo comfortable. Finally, the restaurant downstairs (The Wilson) is very cool! Great food, (not cheap), indoor/outdoor dining with loads of plants in the decor. We will definitely stay here again.

title: Loved the family suites
text: This hotel was clean, attractive, and roomy for NYC, and had a friendly and helpful staff! We got a family suite of two bedrooms and two bathrooms. The bathroom in the kid's side was huge by NYC standards. We also slept great as the beds were comfy and it was dead quiet at night! Quick walk to Times Square and the Flatiron district; right next to midtown. The Wilson, their on-site restaurant, was very good with a beautiful outdoor patio, and right down the road is Oscar Wilde, a beautiful and fun restaurant and bar. Already booked to go back!

title: Fantastic Hospitality
text: I think the pictures and other reviews speak to the hotel itself but for me, staff and hospitality goes just as far (if not further)! After some travel insanity, that was self induced, Akhlima came to the rescue and really helped out. In the world of AirBnB, deconstructed hotels etc. it felt really nice to experience some fantastic hospitality. Thank you!!

title: Kima, best Front Desk Manager Ever
text:
I used to work in the Hospitality industry and I travel quite often for my actual job. Normally I stay at nice business hotels and deal with different "efforts" in the way I am treated as a guest. 
Today I arrived at the beatiful Innside NY Nomad  after an awful experience in another hotel.
The  way Kima, the Front Desk Manager, received us and did everything up to her to make something pleasant of our stay made me write this review.
She showed empathy, she was extremely kind and solved our situation in a short while.
NYC has everything but it is not always the kind of place where people put themselves in one another shoes...thanks Kima for succeeding in giving us your best...I sincerely reccomend Innside NY Nomad due to your service.

title: Outstanding lead staff
text: I want to give a shout out to Kima and Kit who were a silver lining to a challenging stay in NYC. I had to stay on for two extra nights unexpectedly when I got bumped from a flight home, then hurricane weather hit my home destination. I was exhausted upon arrival at the hotel and needed a quite place to work and recoup. On the way, I had a series of further travel mishaps that made it into those nightmare trips where not great luck (losing my cell in a Lyft, with an unresponsive driver, walking into a glass door and hitting my head, one fun time after another) kept badgering my path. Kima and Kit were so tremendously kind and helpful beyond the call of duty throughout. They were compassionate and always there to go the extra mile. The room was quiet (amazing on such a popular street) and the bed comfortable. The cleaning staff were darling. A few improvements the hotel could make - the bathtub plug wasn't working, and there were no extra blankets. I asked for help with this, but help did not come. Also, I was told I could get breakfast with room service, but when I pressed room service during breakfast hours, I got a recording that the restaurant is dine in only. I am guessing it is because the hotel needs more staff to manage such requests.

title: 5+ Stars!  Wonderful Experience!  Amazing Staff!
text: I travel frequently, but rarely does a hotel impress me so much to take time to sit down and write a review.  This property, however, deserves all of the accolades.  Hands down, the staff here are incredible.  We are a family of 5 and often have trouble finding rooms that will work with 3 busy kids and two adults.  The family room with two connecting rooms is an absolute castle in NYC for a busy family.  The individual rooms are actually fairly large compared to most NYC rooms, but having the luxury of a second bathroom and 3 beds can not be outweighed.  Every single request was met with kindness and efficiency.  The rooms were exceptionally clean and modernly appointed.  The beds were some of the most comfortable I have slept on, including 5 star resorts!  The location was perfect for a concert at MSG and was only a 10 minute walk back after.  Parking was easy, the lobby was comfortable and had an amazing outdoor space.  We will stay here again and again.  The front desk staff, support staff and everyone we encountered while staying here deserves all of the praise!  Tremendous!

title: Wonderful hotel- great location for Madison Square Gardens
text:
This was our first stay at this hotel and will definitely not be our last! 

We were in town for my daughter and her friend to attend the Harry Styles concert at Madison Square Garden. If you are going to an event at MSG, this is definitely the place to stay. It’s less than a 10 minute walk and super convenient.

The communication from the hotel was very good, as soon as I reserved on the app, I received an email. I responded asking for a higher floor room and received a email back saying they would definitely accommodate that. 

PARKING- There are ample parking garages down the street and around the block and a nice un-loading zone  in front of the hotel.

CHECK-IN.  We arrived around 1pm and were hoping for an early check in.  The front desk staff was super nice but it was extremely busy. I was told when I checked in that we were upgraded from a double room to a townhouse suite. They wanted to make sure that was OK and I said absolutely!  Unfortunately the room was still being cleaned but we checked our luggage with them. We decided to go to the on-site restaurant the Wilson and have brunch.  

THE WILSON- The restaurant and lobby has a very cool vibe. Our  brunch was delicious. They were very busy but our food came out in a reasonable time.   Definitely plan to eat here during your stay. 

Unfortunately our room was not available until around 4pm but we waited in the lobby which was really nice. The staff seemed incredibly busy with a lot of people checking in but were very friendly and helpful.

OUR SUITE:  We had a free upgrade to a townhouse suite because they overbooked!  Our suite was awesome – one of the largest rooms we’ve ever stayed in in New York! We were on the 19th floor with a wonderful view. The floor to ceiling windows are awesome and so much light and a great view of the city. The furnishings are very nice and modern and the decor is very simplistic but very cool.  The bathrooms are a bit small but had everything we needed. This room had a king bedroom and then a den area with a pull out which we used.  

They charge you a $40 facility fee and the front desk staff told me to make sure we drank the beverages out of the mini bar which we did and they were good! That fee includes your use of Wi-Fi, the gym, etc. I do wish they  disclose the fee when you book but the rate was still very good!  

We would definitely stay here again and plan to as we come to New York at least two times a year!  We loved this hotel!!

title: Mittelmäßig
text:
Für den täglichen Zusatzbeitrag, war das WLAN nicht sehr gut. Auch Personal war so naja. 

Beim Room- Service war das Zimmer nicht immer ganz gemacht (z.B. keine neuen Handtücher) auch war der Duschvorhang nicht so ganz sauber 

Sauberkeit war sonst ganz in Ordnung und die Lage war gut

title: 'Wicked' place to be.
text:
The hospitality and welcoming atmosphere at the Melia Nomad were very well received by my family these past few days.

Since 2018, we look forward to coming back to our 'second home'  when visiting NYC and of course seeing Alexander M, including Christina and Kit at the front desk.

As always, our room, lobby area and restaurant were always clean and felt 'fresh' when we arrived back from our day-long sightseeing ventures in NYC during our stay.

If I may take a phrase from my favorite musical 'Wicked'...

'There is no place like home'.

Alexander M, thank you again for sharing your experiences through your life and reminding us how important it is to be grateful to the people you meet along the 'yellow brick road' of life.

Kindly give the staff at the Melia, a big virtual hug from us.

title: Viaje en familia a nyc
text:
Hotel cool, recién estrenado, muy recomendable
Habitación justa para 4 pero moderna y cómoda
Christina en recepción un 10

Como único “pero” la limpieza de habitaciones regular

Un 9 en total sin duda
Xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

title: Well located and Good rooms
text:
The location is good if you are planing to visita the financial área or the central park zone also.
Good rooms they give complimentary water, safebox, mini bar in the room, slioppers. Bathrooms are Nice very good shape modern.
A nice stay and good breakfast.

title: Beware of the hidden "facility/service fee"
text: The hotel (location/comfort) is generally good but checkout was a very unfortunate experience when given a bill for "daily facility charge".  It was not requested and I was not made aware of an option to decline it at check-in.  Others people during checkout experienced the same issue (followed by extensive discussions on vouchers)   - I choose not to argue as it was a special trip for my daughter - but if this is general practice for this hotel/chain I won't book this hotel/chain again!  As per other reviews we also paid for a skyline view - it wasn't - it looked into an office block/roof  (I could see sky but not what most would consider as a skyline).  If the hotel/chain truly cares about customer satisfaction it will take note of these issues and address them - not to offer platitudes such as "it unfortunate you didn't notice all fees associated with your booking".  $35/day for wifi and flavoured water (with a label stating it is complimentary) is not acceptable (especially if you don't ask for it/not made aware/able to decline).

title: Great stay
text:
My sisters and I came here for a sister’s trip. We got the family suite. There was adjoining room. We needed extra fridge and they were able to deliver . We had concert at Madison Square Garden. This was perfect location for the concert. With all females , we felt safe to walk ok 7th avenue .  Subway stations are nearby as well.  We love Korean food and found Korean town nearby. Our receptionists, maggie Kima
And Kit were amazing . Hotel is connected to Wilson restaurant.

title: Great hotel, better people
text:
I give this hotel a 10.  
I would like to emphasize the treatment of their staff.  I arrived in Manhattan and after 10 minutes my car got fined…., the day did not start well.  

On the other hand, when I asked Kit at the reception for views of the skyline, he said yes and he had the kindness to accompany me to the room, when I saw it,  I began to cry with emotion, impressive views.  

At night I went to the reception because I had a problem with my bank in relation to hotel charges and Kima, office manager, was there.  She was incredibly nice, she helped me a lot giving me all the steps to follow and as a reward, she gave me free breakfast for our stay.  

I cannot be more grateful for the treatment of these two people, it is what makes the difference.  I will be immensely grateful to Kima and Kit for their kindness and help.  This is what makes his hotel one the most fabulous I've ever stayed.  

Thank you Melia for having people like them in your Staff.

Regards, Maria

title: Very  nice stay
text:
Yes…we had the hotel last try before to leave for another option…
What to say?  We finally felt again the kind friendly vibe that we felt on all of our first stays
Everyone been really nice and professional and the hotel room was beautiful with a stunning view.
We will be here again for sure 
If you are looking for a comfortable place in a perfect NYC spot, you found it!
Thanks to the manager for the great hospitality

title: Estancia inolvidable en Nueva York
text:
Desde antes de llegar a Nueva York, Miguel Candelario estuvo recogiendo por email todas mis peticiones para que nuestra estancia en el hotel fuera perfecta.... 
Se preocupó de darnos una habitación comunicada con vista espectaculares, tuvo muchos otros detalles con nosotros y siempre atento a nuestras necesidades.
Seguimos alojados en el hotel y no podemos decir nada malo.. Leslie y Cristina también están siendo muy serviciales y nos ayudan con cualquier gestión que necesitamos.

Las habitaciones del hotel son muy bonitas y acogedoras. Todos los días reponen 2 botellas de agua y refrescos de varios sabores. Además, en recepción siempre tienen botellas de agua por si las necesitas. También hay cafetera de cápsulas.

Si solicitas un microondas en recepción, te lo llevan a la habitación.

Cuando llegamos por la tarde, la habitación siempre está limpia y , si llueve, en recepción te prestan paraguas.

Por otro lado, los desayunos a la carta en The Wilson son espectaculares. 

El hotel está muy bien comunicado por varias líneas de metro y a 10 min de Times Square.

Qué más se puede pedir???

title: Fantástica ubicacion
text:
Viendo las opiniones que tiene el hotel desde el 2020 no han solucionado los problemas. 
.- Las habitaciones no son aptos para tres personas adultas 
.- A las 17 horas todavía no habían  limpiado las habitaciones
.- No se reponía agua ni zumos
Y sobre todo .. si les ofrecen la habitación 1911 NO se alojen en ella, tienen un gimnasio sobre sus cabezas donde se oye como corren por las cintas y cada vez que sueltan las pesas de golpee parece que el techo se hunde. De verdad vergonzoso

title: We'll definitely coming back
text: We stayed here for a night only but let me tell you, the staff is the best we have ever encountered. Kima, Kit and Christina at the front desk were super professional, helpful, kind and the nicest really. The rooms are spacious and very pleasant and the bed is super comfortable. Brenda at the bar/restaurant The Wilson is the best server. She's knowledgeable, hands on and super nice. Will definitely come back.

title: Would stay again
text: We stayed for 2 nights while visiting NYC for the first time in ages, and had a nice time. The room was clean and decorated in a minimalist style.
